* A proven track record of leading and inspiring others through change
* 10+ years of experience from working with architecture covering both business and solution architecture aspects
* A thorough understanding of how to establish a resilient, flexible and cost-efficient architecture
* A genuine interest in new technologies, architectural concepts and best practices, keeping yourself updated on relevant trends and spotting opportunities for innovation and business benefits
* An ability to communicate and collaborate with staff and leaders at all levels, building positive relationships and creating trust. Ability to consciously act at different levels of abstraction, from strategic level to technical implementation
* Knowledge about the life and pension business is an advantage, but not a requirement, as is experience from architectural work at SEB and of integrating third party solutions
* Fluency in English and Swedish, both written and spoken, is a requirement


**What We Offer**
* Opportunities to make a difference in transformational change
* A broad responsibility in a subsidiary with close collaboration between business functions and IT development
* International working environment
* Attractive compensation, access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits, and great facilities in our offices in Arenastaden


**Do you want to join SEB Life & Pension?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than
 **21st of December 2025** 
 . If you have questions about the position, please contact Olga Wohlfahrt, Talent Acquisition Partner, via olga.wohlfahrt@seb.se, but we will not process applications via email.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. Random drug checks is applied.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

 Learn more about working at SEB on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer
   

  

 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.

title: Fullstack Engineer, Fintech
description:
**About Wolt**
 At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.
   

  

 Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.
   

  

 We’re looking for a Fullstack Engineer to join our Consumer Finance Engineering team at Wolt. Our mission is to design, build, and expand consumer facing financial products that integrate seamlessly into the Wolt ecosystem and offer an enhanced experience.
   

  

 What you’ll be doing
   

  

 As an Fullstack Engineer in the Consumer Finance team, your role is to implement and contribute to the development of our beautifully designed consumer app. You will be at the forefront of Wolt’s consumer finance experience, building features that impact millions of users by enabling and creating new surfaces in our application.
   

  

 You’ll work closely with our designer, analyst, product lead, and fellow engineers as we balance our efforts to grow our advertisement business at high speed while maintaining engineering excellence. You will be involved in ensuring timely development and releases. You will also have ownership of quality assurance and solidifying our telemetry logic to ensure data accuracy and system reliability.
   

  

 We embrace a hybrid work model. Join us in our beautiful
 **Helsinki, Stockholm or Tallinn** 
**office** 
 to connect and collaborate with your teammates, or work from home whenever you choose.
   

  

**Day-to-day in this role you’ll:**
* Understand the intention of what we are building and why
* With the help of more seasoned engineers, work on assigned tasks ensuring timely delivery
* Bring new ideas to the table to discuss with the team
* Constantly learn new things and upskill
* You’ll be surrounded by experienced developers who will challenge you, mentor you, and give you the tools to accelerate your growth. If you’re ambitious, open-minded, and excited about building products that people love to use, this is the opportunity to start shaping your career.
* Your role will require an ability to handle ambiguity and rapid changes while maintaining a focus on quality and high performance. This is a unique opportunity to work on new products that will significantly impact how Merchants operate with Wolt.


 Our humble expectations
   

  

**Must haves:**
* Background in backend development, with a solid understanding of modern architectures and best practices.
* Proven experience in server side Kotlin and preferably in Go
* Web frontend experience in React
* Chart out product development plans through thorough discovery, identifying dependencies, estimations and delivery milestones
* Ability to switch between work streams based on urgency and priorities
* Solid team player who can work collaboratively with a business centric mindset
* Quality-first mindset with rock solid testing experience
* Ability to work autonomously or in team
* Help with the onboarding of new team members when needed
* Actively has participated in SRE and On-call
* Fluency in English


**Nice to haves:**
* Go beyond just writing code but also be willing to communicate and coordinate with stakeholders
* Mobile development experience in iOS or Android
* Ability to handle ancillary tasks like addressing accessibility concerns, suggesting design improvements
* Participate in the improving the ways of working of the team
* Actively investigate performance bottlenecks and suggest improvements


 We value developers who can own projects, embrace modern Frontend and Backend technologies, write testable, maintainable code, and collaborate across teams. You should be comfortable with both greenfield and legacy projects, understand the product lifecycle, and balance scalability with customer value.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

 This will be a high impact team developing consumer finance products for Wolt customers. The products have a very large user base spanning 31 countries and every decision that we make affects almost everyone. We make almost all decisions as a team and encourage all ideas and suggestions. The best part of the role is that you can physically see your products in action on the Wolt Consumer app which would be used by our customers on a daily basis.
   

  

 Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
   

  

 We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

title: Business Analyst
description:
**Business Analyst – Södertälje (Hybrid)** 




  





 Our client is looking for a skilled Business Analyst to support requirement gathering, analysis, and solution development within a cross-functional environment. You will collaborate closely with R&D, IT, and Commercial teams to define requirements, create solution models, support preliminary studies, and coordinate acceptance testing to ensure high-quality deliveries.
 



  





**✨ What You Will Do** 




 ·       Work with cross-functional teams to gather, analyse, and manage requirements
 



 ·       Support creation/modelling of new and existing solution needs
 



 ·       Communicate with stakeholders and provide necessary clarification
 



 ·       Lead assignments and preliminary studies
 



 ·       Coordinate acceptance testing to ensure solutions meet requirements
 



  





**📌 Key Qualifications** 




 ·       Minimum 3 years of relevant higher education
 



 ·       Fluent in Swedish & English
 



 ·       Experience in RoD processes, product structures, and AWS development or on-prem → cloud migration
 



 ·       General understanding of software development
 



  





**📍 Important Requirements** 




 ·       Visa: No sponsorship available – must already have a valid Swedish work permit
 



 ·       Sweden-based work experience is required

title: Presales Manager, Domain Consulting - Cortex (Northern Europe)
description:
**Our Mission**
 At Palo Alto Networks®, we’re united by a shared mission—to protect our digital way of life. We thrive at the intersection of innovation and impact, solving real-world problems with cutting-edge technology and bold thinking. Here, everyone has a voice, and every idea counts. If you’re ready to do the most meaningful work of your career alongside people who are just as passionate as you are, you’re in the right place.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 This role is remote, but distance is no barrier to impact. Our hybrid teams collaborate across geographies to solve big problems, stay close to our customers, and grow together. You will be part of a culture that values trust, accountability, and shared success where your work truly matters.
   

  

**Job Description**
**The Team**
 Our Domain Consultant team members work hand-in-hand with large organizations around the world to keep their digital environments protected. We educate, inspire, and empower our potential clients in their journey to security.
   

  

 As part of our team, you’ll support the sales team with technical expertise and guidance when establishing trust with key clients. You won’t find someone at Palo Alto Networks that isn’t committed to your success – with everyone pitching in to assist when it comes to solutions selling, learning, and development. As a member of our presales team, you are driven by a solutions-focused sales environment and find fulfillment in working with clients to resolve incredible complex cyberthreats.
   

  

**Job Summary**
 As Domain Consultant Manager, you are the technical leader for your Domain Consultant team for Northern Europe (Benelux & Nordics). Your team provides technical expertise and guidance in customers’ security operations transformation journey. You will work closely with the Presales Managers and their District Sales Manager counterparts to build relationships with your customers with the goal of helping them detect and prevent advanced cyberattacks and breaches. You and your team will play a key role in defining technical solutions that secure a customer’s key business imperatives and will evangelize our industry leadership in on-prem, cloud, and security services that establish Palo Alto Networks as a customer’s cybersecurity partner of choice.
   

  

 We are looking for a leader to develop our Domain Consultant teams, providing training and technical support as a product expert. Additionally, you will provide feedback to the product management team on new feature requests and product improvements based on what you learn from your customer base. Your team, in partnership with the systems engineering team, will displace competitor technologies and build market share within your targeted list of major accounts, and most importantly, help your client sleep at night as they use our products to build secure digital transactions.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Recruit and hire new Domain Consultants into the team, hiring the best talent in the industry
* Work with your peers to develop a Domain Consultant training curriculum
* Mentor, train, and review Domain Consultants on your team, keeping them engaged and successful in their careers
* Develop relationships with the Solutions Consultant Managers and their teams to ensure full technology coverage in key opportunities
* Lead your team to innovate and iterate to drive high technical validation and PoC win rates for Cortex solutions, while reducing technical validation and PoC timelines
* Provide effective technical leadership in customer interactions to include sharing security operations trends and standard methodologies employed by other customers to actively be part of the selling process
* Provide Domain Consultant expertise and fill in for existing team members if there is a resource conflict or vacation coverage challenge
* Present to customers as our expert in your area at all levels in the customer hierarchy from technician to CIO
* Lead conversations focused on industry trends and emerging changes to the security landscape
* Discuss competitor offerings in the marketplace and positions ours as the best solution
* Support your team in documenting HLD (High Level Design) and key use cases to ensure proper implementation and value realization of Palo Alto Networks solutions
* Review and guide your team’s technical validation plans including POV (proof of value) test plans and customer readiness/requirements
* Build and maintain relationships with key customers to solidify reference accounts and to assist the account teams with defining plans to drive more business
* Act as an escalation point for presales and collaborate with post-sales teams for issues that arise
* Work with product teams to build requirements and roadmap development plans for our Cortex customers
* Maintain an understanding of competitor selling strategies and technologies
* Up to 50% travel within assigned region


**Qualifications**
**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience leading customer-facing presales engineering or solutions architect teams
* Significant experience in sales engineering within SIEM, SOAR, SOC, and/or endpoint environments
* Industry knowledge of security operations market trends and awareness of our roadmap and technology development efforts
* Experience delivering comprehensive security solutions
* Strong communication (written and verbal) and presentation skills
* Experience in leading large teams, allocating resources, managing engagements and resource efficiency
* Proficiency in English language skills


**Additional Information**
**Our Commitment**
 We’re problem solvers that take risks and challenge cybersecurity’s status quo. It’s simple: we can’t accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating, together.
   

  

 We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for all qualified individuals with a disability. If you require assistance or accommodation due to a disability or special need, please contact us at accommodations@paloaltonetworks.com.
   

  

 Palo Alto Networks is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity in our workplace, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

title: OT & IT Systemadministratör
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning**
 AFRY erbjuder tjänster inom teknik, design, digitalisering och rådgivning. Vi är hängivna experter inom industri, energi- och infrastruktur, som skapar värde för kommande generationer. AFRY har en global räckvidd med djupa rötter i Norden. Tillsammans accelererar vi omställningen till ett mer hållbart samhälle.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Är du redo att ta din tekniska karriär till nästa nivå? Vi söker dig som vill bli en nyckelspelare i övergången mellan traditionell IT och industriell teknologi (OT). Om du har erfarenhet från IT-världen och lockas av industrins unika utmaningar, är det här rätt plats för dig.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
 Vi rekryterar nu en eller flera drivna OT -eller IT Systemadministratörer för ett spännande uppdrag hos en av våra kunder i Stockholmsområdet. Du blir en del av ett dedikerat team från AFRY som arbetar uteslutande på plats hos kunden, med möjlighet till flexibelt distansarbete när tillfälle ges.
   

  

 Skall krav:
   

  

* Minst fem års erfarenhet som IT- eller OT-teknisk systemadministratör
* Kunna granska och föreslå nätverksförändingar, inkluderat nätverksinfrastruktur, segmentering och säkerhet
* Erfarenhet av att konfigurera switchar och brandväggar i ett segmenteringsarbete
* Erfarenhet av arbete i Microsoft-plattformar, operativsystem och applikationer
* Lägst gymnasial utbildning med inriktning mot IT eller teknik


 Meriterande:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av säkerhet, säkerhetskopiering och katastrofåterställning
* Erfarenhet från livscykelhantering (LCM) och tjänster i slutet av livscykeln
* Kännedom och erfarenhet av produktionsmiljöer (t.ex. gruvor, fabriker)


 Arbetet som konsult på AFRY innebär att vara konsultmässig, samverka i team och ha hög leveranskapacitet. På AFRY arbetar vi mot Client Centric som innebär, att hålla kunden i fokus.
   

  

 Svenskt medborgarskap kan krävas för vissa befattningar. Säkerhetsprövning och bakgrundskontroller är obligatoriska för försvarsrelaterade roller.
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdag 9 januari 2026. Intervjuer påbörjas mitten av januari månad.
   

  

**Kontaktperson för frågor:**
 Michael Blom, michael.blom@afry.com
   

  

 Sektionschef OT&IT Säkerhet
   

  

 Ellinor Danielsson, ellinor.danielsson@afry.com
   

  

 Rekryteringspartner AFRY
   

  

*Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.*
*På AFRY driver vi förändring i allt vi gör. Vi anser att förändring sker när modiga idéer möts, när vi samarbetar, skapar innovation och omfamnar kreativa lösningar, det är så vi skapar framtiden. Vi söker konstant kvalificerade kandidater som vill ansluta sig till våra inkluderande team runt om i världen. Bli en del av oss och påskynda den gröna omställningen*

title: Engineering Manager till Area Plattform inom Tech
description:
*Nu söker vi en Engineering Manager till arean Plattform inom Tech som tillsammans med övriga chefer inom Product & Tech arbetar både på en övergripande och strategisk nivå samt inom det specifika produktområdet. Du blir en viktig del i arbetet med att skapa vision, mål och engagemang i enlighet med Avanzas strategi.*
*På Avanza tror vi på agila och självstyrande team som tar fram sina egna arbetsprocesser. För att förverkliga våra ambitioner jobbar vi insiktsdrivet och i tvärfunktionella team. Vi tror starkt på teamarbete och värdesätter att jobba tillsammans.*
**Om tjänsten**
 Hela Product & Tech består av 30 utvecklingsteam som tillsammans bygger våra tjänster och erbjudanden. I rollen som Engineering Manager arbetar du nära ett antal team och med personalansvar för ingenjörerna. Den här rollen kommer vara kopplad till vår plattformsarea, där vi bygger och utvecklar den tekniska grund som Avanza står på. Eftersom teamtillhörigheten kan variera söker vi någon som trivs i plattformsnära miljöer och har erfarenhet av att arbeta med moderna plattformar i ett techbolag.
   

  

 Som Engineering Manager har du ansvar för att skapa bästa möjliga förutsättningar för ett starkt team och leder dem mot hög kvalitet och effektiva tekniska leveranser. Rollen innebär att kombinera affärsförståelse med teknisk riktning för att skapa konkret värde för både kund och bolag.
   

  

 Du bygger en kultur som präglas av tillit, autonomi, lärande och samarbete samt en trygg och utvecklande miljö där varje medarbetare får möjlighet att växa och bidra med sin fulla potential. Du är katalysatorn som hjälper teamen att hitta sin inre motivation och coachar dem i allt från tekniska och strategiska utmaningar till individuell kompetensutveckling.
   

  

**Vem vi söker**
 I rollen som Engineering Manager behöver du kunna coacha och utveckla dina medarbetare på bästa möjliga sätt. Därför söker vi dig som har en bakgrund inom modern plattformsutveckling och god förståelse för vad som krävs för ett lyckat agilt arbetssätt. Erfarenhet av att arbeta med molntjänster är viktigt i rollen och vi ser gärna att du har jobbat med större molnplattformar som GCP, AWS eller Azure. Har du varit med på en molnresa, byggt plattformar i molnet eller jobbar i GCP idag är det särskilt värdefullt.
   

  

 Vi tror att du har ett genuint intresse för människor och motiveras av att stötta, leda och guida andra. Som ledare visar du en tydlig riktning och vision och med ett empatiskt och coachande ledarskap skapar du engagemang och delaktighet.
   

  

 Du ser till att det tekniska arbetet ligger i linje med produktstrategi, arkitektur och säkerhetskrav. I vardagen bidrar du i tekniska vägval och uppmuntrar innovation och kunskapsutbyte. Du ansvarar för att teamen har rätt kompetens och processer för att äga och drifta sina system med fokus på larm, incidenthantering och riskreducering.
   

  

 I rollen samarbetar du nära Product Managers och andra nyckelpersoner för att prioritera rätt och skapa samsyn. Du är van att bygga relationer som bygger på tillit och trivs i en miljö som präglas av förändring. Nyfikenhet och erfarenhet av förändringsledning är därför mycket värdefullt.
   

  

**Vi ser gärna att du har**
* Erfarenhet av personalansvar och att leda ingenjörer, gärna i motsvarande roll och i ett moget techbolag.
* Relevant högre utbildning inom teknik, IT eller motsvarande område.
* Erfarenhet av molntjänster och gärna av att arbeta med plattformar i eller på väg mot molnet.
* Erfarenhet eller personligt intresse av privatekonomi och investeringar är meriterande.
* Erfarenhet av att driva och förändringsleda strategiska tekniska satsningar.
* Intresse för områden som strömmande data, personalisering, datadrivenhet, AI och cloud.


**Ansökan**
 Skicka din ansökan genom att klicka på knappen Ansök nedan. Skicka gärna din ansökan snarast då urvalet sker löpande. Har du några frågor kring tjänsten kontaktar du Jakob Huldt, Engineering Director, jakob.huldt@avanza.se
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

*Vi undanber oss vänligen men bestämt kontakt från rekryteringsföretag och annonssäljare.*
 Avanza är Sveriges ledande plattform för sparande och placeringar. Vi drivs av att förändra branschen genom att utmana de stora bankerna och försäkringsbolagen på den svenska sparmarknaden. Vi vill vara tjänsten som förenklar och förbättrar spararnas ekonomi, oavsett om man älskar aktier eller bara vill ha ett bra sparande. Vår vision är att skapa en bättre framtid för miljoner människor. Därför står våra kunders bästa alltid i fokus, precis som det borde vara. Affärsidén är enkel – mer till dig, mindre till banken. En idé som gett oss Sveriges nöjdaste sparare 15 år i rad.

title: AI Engineer
description:
**About Magma**
 Magma is a startup that has quickly grown to become the leading platform for data-driven math education. By leveraging handwritten solutions in a digital format, Magma allows teachers to place emphasis on creativity in math, while gaining key insights into student progression. This creates a more engaging, inclusive and pedagogical math class for all students.
   

  

 Math remains the largest challenge for schools, where one in five students are considered low performers. Math is one of the core pillars on which careers are built, and we believe that school math represents one of the largest opportunities at improving educational outcomes and career prospects for children and young adults.
   

  

 Magma is now growing rapidly across the US and Europe. We are an ambitious team on a meaningful mission of improving math education for millions of children.
   

  

 ‍
   

  

**The Role**
**About**
 We are looking for a builder who wants to help us scale creation and moderation of our math content – meaning math problems, theory, and everything else math-related you might find on a math platform – in ways that will transform the role of a math content creator at Magma, to a math content moderator. In the content team, we have historically had pretty human-intensive content creation processes, no matter if it has been about creating or reviewing problems, aligning already existing content to various educational schemes, or about tagging relevant mathematical skills to problems. As an AI Engineer, you will be part of a team and work towards ensuring that our math content creation processes become a lot more efficient. We are not thinking x2, x3 here, or even x10, but rather x1000. We want to automate as much as possible of our math content creation processes to enable becoming a global company that can operate math content in multiple languages – with high quality – with only a relatively small team of math content moderators. More concretely, below you see a list of projects that you could be expected to work on as part of this role:
   

  

* Automatically matching Magma subchapters to a list of state standards in the US
* Automatically review the math content of a subchapter to ensure that the scope it is intending to have is respected
* Automatically generate math problems in line with Magma standards
* ...


**Who You Are And What You Know**
 We are searching for a team member who wants to take large ownership of Magma's scaling content efforts. To succeed you need to:
   

  

* Be passionate about building stuff with big impact
* Have a big interest in AI and stay up-to-date with the latest releases
* Be very ambitious and like chasing challenging targets
* Be extremely output-oriented and find satisfaction in driving projects to completion
* Eager to learn new things, and have experience of building stuff
* Goal-oriented and accustomed to working towards deadlines in a structured manner
* Great at communicating
* Excellent at giving feedback to others, and adapting to feedback given to you
* Be hardworking and willing to join a fast-paced and rapidly growing startup


**Requirements**
* Bachelors degree in any field
* Coding skills that enable you to build stuff
* Hands-on experience vibe coding with tools like Claude, Cursor, etc.
* Fluent in English


**What We Offer**
* Play a key role in an exciting journey. We are a young company with ambitious targets and meaningful goals
* Fantastic colleagues in a fun environment with great opportunities to learn
* Full-time job with salary and benefits
* An opportunity to work on a meaningful mission and have an exceptional impact on education, society, and how children learn math across the world.


**Start:** 
 As soon as possible
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

**Note:** 
 We practice a
 **5** 
**day in office policy** 
 , and we look forward to working together closely with you :)

title: Technical Engineer to Speeron!
company: Wise IT, part of Wise People Group
description:
*Do you want to take the next step and combine project delivery with advanced troubleshooting in demanding customer environments? Do you enjoy owning network issues from initial study to deployment and being the customer’s technical point of contact? Then this could be the role for you!*
***Your Workday***
 As a Technical Engineer at Speeron, you’ll have a varied and evolving role, working with both projects and support You’ll be involved from start to finish in customer projects: planning, coordinating, and ensuring everything runs smoothly during network and digital system installations and deployments.
   

  

 In your daily work, you’ll handle troubleshooting and problem-solving within networks, WiFi, IPTV, and digital signage, dealing with both simpler questions and more advanced technical challenges.
   

  

 As a Technical Engineer, you’ll have regular contact with customers and partners, often guiding them through technical challenges and solutions. The role is based at our modern office in Solna, but it also requires travel to customer sites across Sweden and occasionally abroad. This is a great opportunity to grow, take responsibility, and contribute to shaping both your own and the company’s development.
   

  

***Who are you?***
 To succeed in the role of Technical Engineer, we believe you have:
   

  

* Several years of experience with networks (TCP/IP, routing/switching, WLAN)
* Experience in installing/configuring network equipment and services (DNS, DHCP, multicast/IGMP)
* Ability to perform site surveys and create network designs
* Skilled in troubleshooting/log analysis in complex environments
* Confident in customer dialogue and technical leadership with partners/suppliers
* Fluent in Swedish and English, both spoken and written


 It’s a plus if you have experience with IPTV/TV distribution and digital signage.
   

  

 As a person, you are self-driven and collaborative, you prioritize wisely, communicate early and clearly. You take ownership, thrive in change, are structured, curious, and quick to learn—without getting stuck in silos.
   

  

**Contact**
 In this recruitment, Speeron collaborates with Wise IT. If you want to know more about the job, contact the responsible Recruitment Consultant, Jacob Elmeljung, jacob.elmeljung@wiseit.se. Unfortunately, Wise IT cannot accept applications via email, as we protect your personal privacy. You can read more about how we process personal data according to GDPR in Wise Group-koncernens policy för behandling av personuppgifter.
   

  

 Welcome with your application
   

  

**Are we a good fit**
 Speeron is the leading integration and technology partner for the hospitality industry in the Nordic Region. We help create the Digital Guest Journey by streamlining hotel guest flows and adding sales opportunities throughout the guest experience – from arrival to check out. All parts of the Digital Guest Journey are fully integrated with the Speeron NEXT Platform. With contactless solutions and support for any PMS, Payment and Locking system, our solution will help any hotel to serve their guests more securely and fast. Speeron provides all infotainment and communication needs for hospitality, including networks, wireless HSIA and back office solutions, IPTV, digital signage, head ends and 24/7 support. https://speeron.com/

title: Specialist Technical Support
description:
**We are hiring a Specialist Technical Support to join our team.**
**We are looking for you on a fixed-term contract as parental leave cover.**
**Let’s talk about the role:**
 The Technical Support Manager Sweden reports to the Nordics Technical Service Manager and is a key member of the Technical Services Department. The role is based on-site at the ResMed Swedish office in Kista and will support customers, internal teams, and distributors within the Swedish market.
   

  

**Position Description:**
 The primary purpose of this role is to provide high-quality technical and engineering support for ResMed products and 3pp products, both to customers and internal stakeholders. This includes ownership of customer queries, management of investigation of product failures, device upgrades, maintenance, testing, technical trainings and management of repairs. The Technical Services Manager also acts as the local QA/RA representative, ensuring regulatory compliance and device traceability throughout the product life cycle. Beyond the day-to-day operational responsibilities, this position plays a key role in representing the Swedish Technical Services function within
 **local, regional, and global meetings and projects** 
 . The successful candidate will actively participate in strategic and operational discussions, ensuring alignment with ResMed’s global service structure, processes, and long-term objectives. This includes contributing to continuous improvement initiatives, sharing local market insights, and supporting the implementation of new global service strategies in the Nordic region.
   

  

**Let’s talk about responsibilities:**
* Provide technical support to local customers via phone, email, and CRM tools (mandatory for tender participation).
* Manage troubleshooting, repair, returns, and replacement processes for sleep apnea devices, life support ventilators, and diagnostic devices, including non-serialized product handling.
* Deliver technical support to internal teams including sales, finance, and customer service.
* Act as the Local QA/RA SCHU representative, responsible for complaint handling, device traceability, and liaison with regulatory authorities and RCHU.
* Provide technical support to distributors in Sweden.
* Manage the aftersales online portal: create customer accounts and conduct user training sessions for hospital technical teams and distributors.
* Conduct technical training and manage re-certification processes for hospital staff (remote or on-site as required by tenders).
* Prepare and deliver technical documentation for tenders, including service manuals, quality certificates, and official tender forms in the local language.
* Manage loan devices, including shipment, return, and record-keeping.
* Drive continuous improvement initiatives: report KPIs, update OKRs, improve Net Promoter Score (NPS), and communicate customer needs to the sales team.
* Coordinate logistics and customs clearance paperwork for service devices.
* Perform other duties and responsibilities as assigned.
* Participate in regional, European and global meetings with the global technical teams.


**Let’s talk about qualifications and experience:**
**Required:**
* University degree in applied sciences,engineering or biomedical science.
* Native Swedish language skills and business-level English.
* Knowledge of measurement units and electronic components.
* Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and CRM tools.
* Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to maintain professionalism and interact effectively with customers and stakeholders at all levels.
* Ability to engage with senior internal and external personnel and drive resolutions that align with company goals and objectives.


**Preferred:**
* Experience working within the hospital or healthcare sector.
* Minimum 2 years’ experience in a similar technical service role using a CRM system (e.g., Salesforce).
* Knowledge of the Swedish healthcare system and/or experience managing relationships with healthcare professionals.
* Hands-on experience in technical repair and/or daily service center operations.
* Familiarity with 5S, Lean, or Six Sigma methodologies.
* Knowledge of an additional Nordic language (Finnish, Norwegian, Danish).
* Proactive and self-driven
* Customer- and business-oriented mindset
* Comfortable with digital communication tools (phone, Zoom, Teams).
* Highly organized and detail oriented.
* Eager to challenge themselves and grow.
* Strong team player with a collaborative approach.


**OK, so what's next?**
 Joining us is more than saying “yes” to making the world a healthier place. It’s discovering a career that’s challenging, supportive and inspiring. Where a culture driven by excellence helps you not only meet your goals, but also create new ones. We focus on creating a diverse and inclusive culture, encouraging individual expression in the workplace and thrive on the innovative ideas this generates. If this sounds like the workplace for you, apply now.
   

  

 Joining us is more than saying “yes” to making the world a healthier place. It’s discovering a career that’s challenging, supportive and inspiring. Where a culture driven by excellence helps you not only meet your goals, but also create new ones. We focus on creating a diverse and inclusive culture, encouraging individual expression in the workplace and thrive on the innovative ideas this generates. If this sounds like the workplace for you, apply now! We commit to respond to every applicant.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Are you passionate about infrastructure and automation? Do you have an interest in the stock market and investing? If so, this could be the perfect opportunity for you. We are looking for a Senior DevOps engineer who’s based in Sweden with a valid work permit to join our DevOps team.
   

  

 As part of the DevOps team, you will make sure everything’s in running order, collaborate closely with developers for existing infrastructure or new projects, and also interact with other non-technical teams so everyone gets the proper tools and services running reliably. Your work will directly shape the user experience and help scale our rapidly growing platform.
   

  

**Why join Quartr**
**Do your life's work:** 
 We focus passionately on doing things with a very high quality across our entire organization.
   

  

**Join the foundational team:** 
 We are still in the very early innings of what we believe to be a multi-decade journey.
   

  

**Skin in the game:** 
 We truly believe in the power of incentives and in sharing the company's success with the team. Therefore, every employee is offered qualified stock options.
   

  

**Rapid, global growth:** 
 Among our clients are some of the world's most influential companies in finance and tech. With proven products and go-to-market strategy, we're steadily grabbing market share in a multi-billion dollar industry.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, implement, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure on AWS
* Manage and optimise Kubernetes clusters for containerised applications
* Develop and maintain infrastructure as code using Terraform & Atlantis
* Improve observability using Grafana Labs’ LGTM stack
* Collaborate proactively with development teams on any relevant topics
* Deal with everything infrastructure-related across the board, be it reliability or troubleshooting, optimizing DX, as well as keeping track of the costs.


**Required Skills**
 We believe you'll thrive if you:
   

  

* Have solid experience with AWS services (EKS, IAM, EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda, etc.)
* Are proficient in Kubernetes, including deployment, scaling, and troubleshooting.
* Have strong experience with Infrastructure as Code, particularly Terraform, while enjoying the occasional Python & Bash scripts
* Are skilled in observability tools such as Grafana, Mimir, and Loki
* Have experience with CI/CD tools (we use Github Actions & ArgoCD) and best practices
* Actively contribute to a friendly, collaborative work environment over Slack, Linear & Notion
* Feel comfortable in a high-tempo environment where priorities can shift quickly
* Are fluent in English (our company language), both written and spoken


**Desired qualities**
* Be self-driven, proactive, and take full ownership of your projects
* Communicate clearly and effectively, thriving in a high-paced, collaborative environment
* Knowledge of security best practices and compliance requirements (SoC2 type I and II)
* Be able to balance pragmatism with craftsmanship, knowing when to move fast and when to build for long-term scalability
* An interest in finance and the financial markets is a big plus


**What We Offer**
* Competitive salary
* Company option plan
* Top-notch equipment of your choice
* Wellness allowance
* Occupational pension
* Flexible work arrangements (remote or on-site in Stockholm/Gothenburg)
* Must be based in Sweden with a valid work permit


 By joining Quartr, you'll be part of a rapid growth story in the global investor relations space, where no day is like the other – in a good way.
   

  

**Note: We are not seeking assistance from consultants or recruitment agencies.**
**About Quartr**
 Every day, leading companies and financial institutions worldwide rely on Quartr to make better decisions faster. The product suite includes: Quartr API, enabling third parties to build custom solutions powered by Quartr's unique live earnings calls and transcription technology, and its extensive global database of IR material – including public company filings, archived earnings call transcripts, and slide deck presentations. Quartr Pro, a desktop research platform that increases efficiency and precision in qualitative public market research for top hedge funds, asset managers, equity research departments, and IR professionals. A free mobile app allowing users to always stay informed and conduct research anytime, anywhere.

title: Senior Backend Engineer
description:
**Senior Backend-Focused Full-Stack Engineer** 




  





**Location:** 
 Stockholm (Hybrid – office-first with flexibility)
 



**Type:** 
 Permanent employment
 



  





 We’re looking for a Senior Backend-Focused Full-Stack Engineer to join a fast-growing tech company building a highly scalable platform in a high-traffic, high-availability environment. This is a chance to work on complex backend systems, optimise performance at scale, and shape the architecture of a product that’s already validated and generating revenue.
 



  





 You’ll be part of a small, senior team where autonomy and ownership are key. Expect to work across the full development lifecycle (design, build, deploy, and run) while influencing technical decisions that will define the company’s growth.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 



* Architect and build scalable, high-performance backend services using modern technologies.
* Optimise PostgreSQL databases for large-scale data processing and high traffic environments.
* Collaborate with product and design teams to deliver features that drive growth and engagement.
* Make decisions around infrastructure, security, and long-term maintainability.
* Contribute to a culture of “you build it, you run it” with strong DevOps practices.



  





**Requirements:** 



* 5+ years’ experience in backend development with strong full-stack capability.
* Expertise in TypeScript, Node.js, and modern web frameworks.
* Deep knowledge of AWS and cloud-native architecture.
* Solid experience with PostgreSQL, including optimisation at scale.
* Bonus: Interest or experience in Web3/blockchain, payments, or high-traffic systems.
* Ability to take ownership and thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative startup environment.



  





**Key points:** 



* VC-backed company with strong financial runway and paying customers.
* Unique product in the market with huge growth potential.
* Opportunity to work on complex technical challenges including high traffic, on-chain transactions, and large-scale data processing.
* Autonomy and scope to grow into leadership roles as the team scales.
* Collaborative, innovative culture where your ideas shape the product and the future of the company.



  





 If you are interested, please apply with an updated CV. All applications must be in Stockholm with a valid working visa.

title: Seniora it-drifttekniker, klientplattform
description:
Enheten för it-drift, it-infrastruktur och it-säkerhet söker ett flertal seniora it-drifttekniker som ska delta i det dagliga arbetet med drift och förvaltning av Åklagarmyndighetens it-miljö. Som senior it-drifttekniker ingår du i enheten för it-drift, it-infrastruktur och it-säkerhet som består av 50 medarbetare inom olika teknikområden.
   

  

**Enheten Ansvarar För**
* Löpande drift och förvaltning av myndighetens it-infrastruktur, system och tekniska plattformar
* Bemanning av beredskapen dygnet runt året runt samt andra och tredje linjen inom vår it-organisation.


 Dina arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Arbetet på enheten innebär möjlighet att jobba med moderna system och verktyg i en it-miljö med stor vikt på it-drift- och it-säkerhet.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden kommer främst att vara drift, förvaltning av Åklagarmyndighetens it-infrastruktur och tekniska plattformar, Vilket innefattar underhåll, installation och konfiguration samt avancerad felsökning och åtgärder av myndighetens it-infrastruktur, tekniska plattformar och relaterade stödsystem. Säkerhetstänket är väl utvecklat och är en naturlig del i arbetet.
   

  

 Du kommer även att arbeta med daglig drift, incidenthantering, övervakningslarm, underhålla och säkerställa drift och tillgänglighet och vara en naturlig del i supportkedjan som spänner över samtliga teknikområden, samt att delta i olika projekt. Du är en centralt placerad resurs med bra överblick över samtliga system och komponenter för att upptäcka förbättringsåtgärder.
   

  

 Dina kvaliteter och kvalifikationer
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har
   

  

* gymnasieexamen eller motsvarande utbildning inom it som arbetsgivaren bedömer relevant
* flera års väl vitsordad arbetslivserfarenhet inom it-infrastrukturområdet
* ett stort tekniskt intresse och förståelse för grundläggande it-teknik
* viljan och förmåga att lära dig nya generationer av nuvarande teknisk plattform.


 Du har spetskompetens inom några av följande områden:
   

  

* Automatisering med Script (PowerShell)
* Virtualisering (VMware, Nutanix, Containers, Podman, Kubernetes)
* Operativsystem Server (Windows server 2022 och versionshantering)
* Autentisering (Kerberos, SAMLv2, OpenID-Connect)
* Active Directory
* Exchange, spam och antiviruslösningar (Fortimail, fortisandbox)
* Certifikatslösningar, Kryptering och signering (PKI)
* Databashantering (MS SQL)


 Som person vill vi att du
   

  

* är ansvarstagande och har en god samarbetsförmåga
* är lyhörd och relaterar till din omgivning på ett smidigt sätt med din positiva attityd och inställning
* är strukturerad, ordningsam och säkerställer kvalitet i ditt arbetsresultat
* är lösningsorienterad och prestigelös
* har lätt för att uttrycka dig i tal och i skrift både på svenska och engelska.


 Det är meriterande om du har kunskap och erfarenhet av
   

  

* teknisk projektledning
* it-drift i organisationer med höga säkerhetskrav.


 Om anställningen
   

  

 Vi är en modern arbetsplats som möjliggör distansarbete, vilket gör att många medarbetare på it-avdelningen både arbetar på kontoret och virtuellt.
   

  

 Anställningen är en tillsvidareanställning med 6 månaders provanställning.
   

  

 Tester förekommer i rekryteringsprocessen.
   

  

 Anställningen är placerad i säkerhetsklass och därmed sker säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll.
   

  

 På grund av arkivbestämmelser sparar vi ansökningar i två år. När du ansöker kommer dina personuppgifter att behandlas enligt offentlighetsprincipen samt dataskyddsförordningen. När du skickar din ansökan till oss, samtycker du till detta.
   

  

 Åklagarmyndigheten som arbetsgivare
   

  

 På Åklagarmyndigheten känner vi stolthet när vi går till jobbet. Tillsammans är vi 2 200 engagerade och kompetenta medarbetare som står upp för rättssäkerhet, rättstrygghet och demokratiska värden. Oavsett roll i myndigheten så bidrar alla till vårt viktiga samhällsuppdrag.
   

  

 Vill du bli en del av Åklagarmyndigheten? Vi strävar efter att vara en välkomnande och inkluderande arbetsplats som speglar samhällets mångfald.
   

  

 Ansök redan i dag!

title: Full Stack AWS Engineer
description:
**Shape the Future of Cloud Solutions at Tobii**
 At
 **Tobii** 
 , we’re redefining how humans interact with technology. Our Glasses Explore platform helps researchers capture and analyze real-world visual behavior—unlocking insights that improve training, workflows, and user experiences. Now, we’re looking for a
 **Full Stack AWS Engineer** 
 to join our Engineering Cloud team and build the next generation of scalable, secure, and AI-driven cloud applications.
   

  

**What** 
**You’ll Do**
 As a Full Stack AWS Engineer, you’ll take ownership across the entire software development lifecycle—from architecture and infrastructure-as-code to backend development and CI/CD automation. Your work will power Glasses Explore, the companion software for Tobii Glasses X, enabling researchers worldwide to understand human attention like never before.
   

  

 Your day-to-day will include:
   

  

  

* Designing and building robust backend systems in AWS using Python and modern frameworks.
* Developing APIs and working with serverless architecture for scalable, secure cloud-native applications.
* Leveraging AI-assisted development tools (e.g., GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT, Claude) to accelerate coding, refactoring, and documentation.
* Collaborating with cross-functional teams to refine architecture, review code, and improve processes.
* Ensuring system reliability, performance, and cost efficiency for a large dataset or user base.


**What** 
**We’re Looking For**
* A couple of years of AWS development experience, including working with services such as serverless or container-based architecture.
* Hands-on cloud backend engineering skills.
* Worked with building scalable solutions, with large datasets and many clients/users
* Proven use of AI-assisted development tools in real projects.
* Experience of API design, serverless, and distributed systems in AWS or similar.
* Experience with Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform/CDK/CloudFormation).
* Master’s degree in software engineering or related field.
* Great English communication skills (bonus for additional languages) and the ability to bridge teams: explain solutions, surface trade-offs, and unblock decisions.


 It’s a merit if you also have experience with modern JavaScript frameworks (React, Angular, Vue), AWS ML services such as Bedrock and MCP with GPU-based architectures and are comfortable experimenting with agentic workflows and autonomous coding loops.
   

  

**Sounds like you?**
 You’re curious, proactive, and passionate about building scalable systems. You thrive in collaboration, communicate clearly, and take ownership from concept to delivery. You’re excited about experimenting with cutting-edge tools and driving innovation in cloud engineering. In short, you’re someone who gets things done—and brings others along for the ride.
   

  

**Join Tobii and Shape the Future**
 We’re welcoming, inventive, and doers. Our passion and ways of working have driven our success for over 20 years—and we’re just getting started. Join a close-knit mechatronics team where collaboration and innovation thrive. Headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden, Tobii covers a global market with a diverse client roster.
   

  

**Apply already today!**
 We are curious about you, so let us know about your background, experiences, and where you’re heading. Please submit your resume or LinkedIn profile through our website. And don’t wait—at Tobii we move quickly!
   

  

 Welcome to Tobii!

title: Head of IP Routers and Fronthaul
description:
**Join our Team**
**About this opportunity:**
 As the Head of IP Routers & Fronthaul, you will oversee Ericsson’s strategic initiatives and operations for key portfolios, including RAN Connect, Router 6000, and Optical Fronthaul. These portfolios are vital to Ericsson’s 5G transport solutions, enabling the development of scalable, sustainable, and high-performing networks that meet evolving industry demands.
   

  

 In this role, you will guide technical innovation, foster key partnerships, and align business strategies to ensure Ericsson continues to lead the telecommunications industry. Your leadership will enable Ericsson to deliver transformative, market-leading connectivity solutions while meeting evolving operator needs and advancing sustainable practices.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Strategic Leadership:


 Define and execute the vision and roadmap for RAN Connect, Router 6000, and Optical Fronthaul portfolios, ensuring alignment with Ericsson’s overall strategies.
   

  

 Position Ericsson’s transport portfolios as leaders in cutting-edge architectures, including high-performing programmable networks, RAN Compute, and Cloud RAN, driving innovation for 5G and beyond.
   

  

 Develop and manage strategies and relationships with key transport partners, driving collaboration to shape innovative network technologies.
   

  

 Demonstrate a challenger mindset with strong business insight into customer value, adopting a solution-oriented, end-to-end functional ownership approach.
   

  

* Product Development & Innovation:


 Oversee product lifecycle management, integrating emerging technologies like packet-based transport systems, advanced synchronization, and energy-efficient solutions.
   

  

 Drive innovation in scalable network technologies that address operator challenges within modern telecommunications landscapes.
   

  

* Profitability and Market Growth:


 Drive portfolio growth and profitability by identifying key market opportunities and executing strategies that enhance Ericsson’s competitive position globally.
   

  

 Collaborate across teams to refine customer-centric solutions and develop compelling value propositions.
   

  

* Stakeholder Collaboration:


 Build strong partnerships with Ericsson’s internal teams, customers, and industry organizations to establish cohesive product offerings.
   

  

 Actively engage with external stakeholders to align portfolio strategies with market demands and customer needs, fostering trust and collaboration.
   

  

* Operational Excellence:


 Ensure timely delivery of high-quality outputs within budget and resource constraints.
   

  

 Set ambitious performance targets, ensure accountability, and deliver high-quality outcomes on time and within budget.
   

  

 Monitor competitor actions, market trends, and customer feedback, adjusting strategies to enhance Ericsson’s offerings and leadership position.
   

  

**The skills you bring:**
* Proven ability to lead high-performing teams in telecommunications
* Deep understanding of the RAN portfolio, with focus on RAN architectures and technologies.
* Demonstrated expertise in IP routing, optical transport, and fronthaul systems
* Comprehensive knowledge of the global telecom market, including emerging trends and evolving transport technologies.
* Demonstrated ability to build and sustain partnerships across diverse teams and stakeholders


**Leadership Requirements:**
 Bring leadership to life by Creating Clarity through strategic foresight and actionable business strategies, Developing People through empathetic leadership, fostering high-performing teams, and empowering future leaders, and Delivering Results by driving accountability, making decisive decisions under uncertainty, and achieving measurable outcomes that meet evolving market demands.
   

  

**Note: Security clearance including references and relevant background screening will be conducted for final candidates.**
**Last date to apply: 24th December 2025**
**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm
   

  

**Primary Recruiter:** 
 Versha Sharma
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 777479

title: Junior content och marknadskoordinator
description:
**Junior Content & Marknadskoordinator** 





 Vill du vara med och forma framtidens IT-utbildningar och hjälpa fler hitta vägen in i branschen? Nu söker vi en självgående och kreativ Content & Marknadskoordinator som vill skapa relevant innehåll, stärka vår marknadsföring och bidra till en professionell kommunikation genom hela antagningsprocessen – samtidigt som du stöttar vårt arbete med att positionera Chas Academy som en attraktiv partner gentemot företag och organisationer.
 




  





**Om rollen** 





 Som Content & Marknadskoordinator blir du en nyckelperson i vårt marknads- och antagningsteam. Rollen kombinerar kreativt content-skapande med kommunikation och ger dig möjlighet att påverka hur vi syns, låter och uppfattas av både framtida studerande och våra partners i näringslivet.
 





 Du arbetar nära marknad-och antagningschefen samt antagningskoordinatorn. Du får stort eget ansvar i att driva framåt de aktiviteter som inspirerar, informerar och stärker vår position på marknaden.
 




  




**Du kommer bland annat att:** 
* Skapa engagerande innehåll för våra sociala medier (Instagram, TikTok, Youtube shorts, LinkedIn).



  




* Producera artiklar, storytelling, studentcase och nyheter för vår webbplats.



  




* Stötta antagningsprocessen med tydlig, korrekt och målgruppsanpassad kommunikation.



  




* Planera, producera och skicka nyhetsbrev till olika målgrupper.



  




* Arbeta med marknadsaktiviteter och event som stärker vår varumärkespositionering mot företag och samarbetspartners.



  




* Bidra i kampanj- och aktivitetsplanering kopplat till både studentrekrytering och företagsrelationer.



  





**Vem är du?** 





 Vi söker dig som är självgående, initiativrik och har en naturlig känsla för digital kommunikation. Du älskar att skapa innehåll, har öga för trender och vad som fångar målgruppen och trivs i en roll där du får tänka både kreativt och strukturerat.
 





 Du är trygg i att jobba i högt tempo, tycker om att ta kontakt med nya personer, vågar föreslå idéer och trivs med att ta ansvar för dina egna processer.
 




  




**Vi tror att du har:** 
* Har eftergymnasial utbildning eller motsvarande kunskaper inom kommunikation och digital marknadsföring.



  




* Erfarenhet av att skapa content för olika sociala kanaler.



  




* God förmåga att skriva tydligt, engagerande och målgruppsanpassat både på svenska och på engelska.



  




* Grundläggande kunskap inom digital marknadsföring.



  




* Erfarenhet av nyhetsbrev.



  




* Grundläggande bild- eller videoredigering.



  






 Meriterande om du har erfarenhet av att ha jobbat inom
 



* Yrkeshögskolan
* It-branschen



  





**Vi erbjuder** 



* En kreativ och nytänkande miljö med stora möjligheter att utvecklas.



  




* En kultur där mod, nyfikenhet och samarbete står i centrum.



  




* Stort handlingsutrymme och chansen att påverka hur vi syns och uppfattas.



  




* En vardag där du faktiskt gör skillnad – för våra studerande, våra partnerföretag och branschen i stort.



  





**Vilka är vi?** 





 Chas Academy är en ledande yrkeshögskola inom IT-specialisering, och en del av IT-koncernen Chas Visual Management. Vi är i en spännande expansionsfas, och med ca 600 studenter och nio olika utbildningsinriktningar är vi fortfarande på frammarsch. Vi är verksamma inom områden som mjukvaruutveckling, webbutveckling och design. 
 




  






 På Chas Academy är alla medarbetare lika viktiga! Vi är ett litet och prestigelöst gäng som trivs med att jobba ihop. Vi har kul på jobbet, bollar idéer med varandra och hjälps åt. Vi är fokuserade och utvecklingsinriktade samtidigt som vi ser till att ha tid för det allra viktigaste i livet - vänner, familj och oss själva.
 




  





**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan! Urval sker löpande.** 




  





 Arbetsplats: Arenavägen 61, Johanneshov
 



 Anställning: Tidsbegränsad anställning ( februari - september 2026 ) med möjlighet till förlägning
 



 Heltid 
 



 Lön: Enligt överenskommelse, Lönetyp: Fast månads- vecko- eller timlön - Uppge ditt löneanspråk i din ansökan 
 



 Skicka in din ansökan här på Linkedin eller till sofia.jonsson@chasacademy.se senast den 6 januari. 
 



 Ange referens
 **Junior Content & Marknadskoordinator** 
 i din ansökan
 



  





 Löpande tillsättning, tjänsten kan tillsättas före sista ansökningsdagen.

title: Seniora it-drifttekniker med inriktning it-infrastruktur
description:
Enheten för it-drift, it-infrastruktur och it-säkerhet söker ett flertal seniora it-drifttekniker som ska delta i det dagliga arbetet med drift och förvaltning av Åklagarmyndighetens it-miljö. Som senior it-drifttekniker ingår du i enheten för it-drift, it-infrastruktur och it-säkerhet som består av 50 medarbetare inom olika teknikområden.
   

  

**Enheten Ansvarar För**
* Löpande drift och förvaltning av myndighetens it-infrastruktur, system och tekniska plattformar
* Bemanning av beredskapen dygnet runt året runt samt andra och tredje linjen inom vår it-organisation.


 Dina arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Arbetet på enheten innebär möjlighet att jobba med moderna system och verktyg i en it-miljö med stor vikt på it-drift- och it-säkerhet.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden kommer främst att vara drift, förvaltning av Åklagarmyndighetens it-infrastruktur och tekniska plattformar, Vilket innefattar underhåll, installation och konfiguration samt avancerad felsökning och åtgärder av myndighetens it-infrastruktur, tekniska plattformar och relaterade stödsystem. Säkerhetstänket är väl utvecklat och är en naturlig del i arbetet.
   

  

 Du kommer även att arbeta med daglig drift, incidenthantering, övervakningslarm, underhålla och säkerställa drift och tillgänglighet och vara en naturlig del i supportkedjan som spänner över samtliga teknikområden, samt att delta i olika projekt. Du är en centralt placerad resurs med bra överblick över samtliga system och komponenter för att upptäcka förbättringsåtgärder.
   

  

 Dina kvaliteter och kvalifikationer
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har
   

  

* gymnasieexamen eller motsvarande utbildning inom it som arbetsgivaren bedömer relevant
* flera års väl vitsordad arbetslivserfarenhet inom it-infrastrukturområdet
* ett stort tekniskt intresse och förståelse för grundläggande it-teknik
* viljan och förmåga att lära dig nya generationer av nuvarande teknisk plattform.


 Du har spetskompetens inom några av följande områden:
   

  

* Automatisering med Script (PowerShell)
* Virtualisering (VMware, Nutanix, Containers, Podman, Kubernetes)
* Operativsystem Server (Windows server 2022 och versionshantering)
* Autentisering (Kerberos, SAMLv2, OpenID-Connect)
* Active Directory
* Exchange, spam och antiviruslösningar (Fortimail, fortisandbox)
* Certifikatslösningar, Kryptering och signering (PKI)
* Databashantering (MS SQL)


 Som person vill vi att du
   

  

* är ansvarstagande och har en god samarbetsförmåga
* är lyhörd och relaterar till din omgivning på ett smidigt sätt med din positiva attityd och inställning
* är strukturerad, ordningsam och säkerställer kvalitet i ditt arbetsresultat
* är lösningsorienterad och prestigelös
* har lätt för att uttrycka dig i tal och i skrift både på svenska och engelska.


 Det är meriterande om du har kunskap och erfarenhet av
   

  

* teknisk projektledning
* it-drift i organisationer med höga säkerhetskrav.


 Om anställningen
   

  

 Vi är en modern arbetsplats som möjliggör distansarbete, vilket gör att många medarbetare på it-avdelningen både arbetar på kontoret och virtuellt.
   

  

 Anställningen är en tillsvidareanställning med 6 månaders provanställning.
   

  

 Tester förekommer i rekryteringsprocessen.
   

  

 Anställningen är placerad i säkerhetsklass och därmed sker säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll.
   

  

 På grund av arkivbestämmelser sparar vi ansökningar i två år. När du ansöker kommer dina personuppgifter att behandlas enligt offentlighetsprincipen samt dataskyddsförordningen. När du skickar din ansökan till oss, samtycker du till detta.
   

  

 Åklagarmyndigheten som arbetsgivare
   

  

 På Åklagarmyndigheten känner vi stolthet när vi går till jobbet. Tillsammans är vi 2 200 engagerade och kompetenta medarbetare som står upp för rättssäkerhet, rättstrygghet och demokratiska värden. Oavsett roll i myndigheten så bidrar alla till vårt viktiga samhällsuppdrag.
   

  

 Vill du bli en del av Åklagarmyndigheten? Vi strävar efter att vara en välkomnande och inkluderande arbetsplats som speglar samhällets mångfald.
   

  

 Ansök redan i dag!

title: Backend Engineer, Discovery
description:
**About Wolt**
 At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.
   

  

 Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.
   

  

 We’re looking for passionate and product-minded Backend Engineers to join our Discovery team - the group behind some of the most visible and impactful parts of Wolt’s consumer app. You’ll work on features that help millions of users discover their next favorite restaurant, grocery store, or product- from the homepage and category views to new vertical experiences like groceries, electronics, pet food, and health & beauty.
   

  

 This is more than just a backend engineering role. We’re looking for someone who combines strong technical skills with curiosity, ownership, and a deep interest in creating meaningful user experiences at scale.
   

  

**What you’ll do:**
* Design, build, and operate high-performance backend services - primarily in Kotlin (experience with Python or especially with Go is a plus) - powering discovery surfaces, front pages, and category experiences across Wolt’s new and existing verticals.
* Own your services end-to-end: from requirements, design, and delivery to testing, CI/CD, deployment, monitoring, and on-call.
* Translate product and user needs into scalable, low-latency solutions and run experiments (A/B tests, feature flags) to continuously improve performance and impact.
* Collaborate closely with Product Leads, Frontend, Data, and Machine Learning teams to build features like search, ranking, personalization, and data-pipeline integrations.
* Drive reliability, observability, and efficiency - through automated testing, logging, tracing, alerting, incident response, and post-mortems.
* Continuously improve technical quality by reducing tech debt, proposing architectural improvements, and measuring their outcomes.


**Our humble expectations:**
 We’re looking for someone with:
   

  

* Previous experience in backend development using Kotlin (or modern Java). Python and Go experience is highly valued as well.
* A strong ownership mindset - someone proactive, curious, and eager to understand how things work under the hood.
* A product- and customer-focused approach, with a pragmatic attitude toward solving real user problems.
* Excellent communications skills in English


 Why You’ll Love Working Here:
   

  

* Make an impact: Build features used by millions across multiple countries.
* Own it end-to-end: Design, build, and operate high-performance backend services with real product impact.
* Work with great tech stack: Kotlin at the core, plus Go and Python for scalable, modern systems.
* Collaborate & innovate: Partner with Product, Data, and ML teams to create personalized, data-driven user experiences.
* Grow & learn: Improve architecture, reliability, and performance in a culture that values ownership, curiosity, and teamwork.


**🌍 Where You’ll Work**
 You can be based in Helsinki or Stockholm, and you’ll be part of a distributed, cross-functional team with engineers across Berlin and Helsinki. We operate in a remote-friendly environment designed to encourage collaboration and innovation.
   

  

 Next steps
   

  

 This position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!
   

  

 Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
   

  

 We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

title: Kontoansvarig
description:
**Vill du växa med ett av branschens snabbast växande bolag?** 




 Har du erfarenhet av försäljning inom IT eller utskriftshantering – och vill ta nästa steg i ett bolag där det faktiskt händer saker? Perfect Print fortsätter växa i rekordfart och nu söker vi en passionerad och driven säljare som vill vara med på vår resa. Du som vill kliva in i ett företag där ambition, energi och utveckling är en självklar del av vardagen.
 



**Vilka är vi?** 




 Perfect Print är en leverantör av utskriftslösningar. Vi är en helhetsleverantör som konfigurerar, installerar och driftar utskriftslösningar hos medelstora och stora företag och organisationer över hela Sverige.
 



 Som bolag är vi inne i en kraftigt tillväxt och behöver förstärka vår säljorganisation med ytterligare Account Managers. Vi söker dig som gillar att utmana dig själv och gillar att kliva ur komfortzonen för att växa som individ – för då växer även vi som företag! 
 



  





  





  





**Om rollen** 




 Som Account Manager på Perfect Print blir du en nyckelspelare i vår fortsatta tillväxt.
 



 Din främsta uppgift är att se till att vi är – och förblir – våra kunders bästa partner.
 



 Du ansvarar för företagskunder med 50–500 anställda och arbetar nära relevanta beslutsfattare för att förstå deras behov och skapa värde i varje steg.
 



 Du kommer att:
 


* Kartlägga affärsmöjligheter och nyckelpersoner hos både nya och befintliga kunder
* Utveckla befintliga kunder och bredda dem inom vårt erbjudande.
* Skapa och bygga långsiktiga relationer genom hög aktivitet och stort engagemang.
* Delta i utbildningar via våra strategiska leverantörer och internt.



 Det här är en roll för dig som gillar att driva din egen agenda, som trivs med ansvar och som motiveras av att se konkreta resultat av ditt arbete. Till din hjälp har du ett erfaret och professionellt team och du rapporterar till försäljningschef.
 



  





  





**Vem är du?** 




 Vi ser gärna att du:
 


* Är en relationsbyggare och drivs av att göra bra affärer.
* Har hög social kompetens, lätt för att kommunicera och skapa förtroende.
* Har eget driv och kan ta ägandeskap över hela säljprocessen – från prospektering till avslut.
* Trivs i ett tillväxtbolag där tempo, utveckling och möjligheter är en vardag.
* Är en lagspelare och drivs av att se hela laget lyckas.



**För att lyckas i rollen behöver du:** 



* 3–5 års erfarenhet av B2B-försäljning inom IT eller utskriftshantering
* B-körkort och tillgång till bil
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift



  





  





**Vi erbjuder dig:** 














 På Perfect Print får du som medarbetare möjlighet att utvecklas i en kreativ och framåtsträvande miljö där kvalitet, innovation och laganda står i fokus. Vi erbjuder trygga anställningsvillkor, flexibel arbetsplats och utrymme för personlig utveckling genom interna utbildningar och ständigt nya utmaningar. Hos oss får du arbeta i ett sammansvetsat team där vi värdesätter dialog, humor och arbetsglädje – och där vi alltid strävar efter att ligga steget före i branschen.
 



 Vi är kollektivanslutna och har generösa friskvårdsförmåner.
 



  





  





  





**Redo att ta nästa steg?** 




 Om du vill vara en del av ett framgångsrikt och växande bolag där du får möjlighet att påverka, utvecklas och göra skillnad – då vill vi gärna höra från dig!
 


* Skicka in din ansökan redan idag.

title: SAP Data Engineer
description:
Are you a highly skilled Data Engineer with deep SAP expertise and a passion for cloud-native engineering? Do you thrive in complex, large-scale data environments where your work directly accelerates business impact? Then MULTIPLY Teknik & IT is the place for you.
 



 At Multiply, we combine high-end engineering consulting with our own product ecosystem — 
 **VisFlow** 
 , 
 **VisFlow Embedded™** 
 , and 
 **Multiply Academy** 
  — to deliver end-to-end data, engineering, and lifecycle intelligence for some of Sweden’s most advanced industries.
 



 Now we’re looking for a Senior Data Engineer who can strengthen our capabilities in 
 **SAP and Google Cloud Platform** 
 , enabling our customers to build scalable analytical solutions and multiply value with data.
 



  





 ⭐ 
 **About the Role** 




 As a Senior Data Engineer at Multiply, you take 
 **end-to-end responsibility** 
  for building, optimizing, and supporting modern data products across 
 **GCP** 
  and 
 **SAP Datasphere** 
 . You will work at the intersection of:
 


* cloud-native data engineering
* SAP domain knowledge
* advanced analytics & data modelling
* scalable architecture and DevOps practices
* collaborative, product-driven development



 You support data mesh principles, guide product teams, and serve as a technical leader who drives quality, structure, and innovation across the entire data lifecycle.
 



 This is a role for someone who wants to shape high-impact data solutions that power decision-making, operations, and customer experience.
 



  





**What You Will Do** 



* Build, enhance, and optimize data pipelines and products on 
 **Google Cloud Platform**
* Manage 
 **CI/CD** 
 , Terraform, Git, and cloud infrastructure in GCP
* Deploy and maintain analytical capabilities in 
 **SAP Datasphere**
* Integrate SAP sources such as ECC, CAR, EWM, POS, Inventory, and General Ledger into GCP-native solutions
* Model and provision data using 
 **CDS Views** 
 , Datasphere modeling layers, and best-practice SAP patterns
* Apply strong engineering principles to ensure 
 **scalability, security, observability, governance, and performance**
* Collaborate with Product Owners and cross-domain teams to support data mesh and customer-centric development
* Drive continuous improvement, reduce technical debt, and elevate engineering practices
* Coach engineers, lead pair programming, and present solutions to complex engineering challenges
* Promote Agile ways of working and help teams deliver with speed and quality



  





**Required Qualifications** 



* **8+ years** 
  of experience in data engineering
* Strong expertise with 
 **GCP stack** 
 : BigQuery, Dataflow, DBT
* Deep experience with 
 **SAP Retail scenarios** 
  (ECC, CAR, EWM)
* Advanced understanding of SAP data structures and SAP Datasphere
* Hands-on experience with 
 **Power BI** 
  or other BI tools
* Solid knowledge of data formats (Avro, Parquet) and SQL
* Programming skills in 
 **Python, Java, or Scala**
* Experience with 
 **RDBMS and NoSQL** 
  databases
* Strong ability to design scalable, enterprise-grade data products
* Experience with Integrated Planning/BPC
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills
* Fluent in English (Swedish is a plus)



**Preferred Qualifications** 



* Experience from the 
 **retail industry**
* Familiarity with 
 **SAFe** 
  or other Agile frameworks
* Experience as 
 **Scrum Master** 
  or in leading Agile ceremonies
* Proven ability to solve complex challenges through coding and analytical thinking



  





**Why Multiply?** 




 At Multiply, you join a company that blends:
 


* **knowledge-based consulting**
* **VisFlow – our product ecosystem for engineering intelligence**
* **VisFlow Embedded™ – data generation at the edge**
* **Multiply Academy – structured growth & certification**



 We deliver 
 **end-to-end value** 
 : from sensors and embedded systems → to cloud analytics → to modelling, traceability, simulation and decision intelligence.
 



 Our culture is built on Swedish values: trust, humility, transparency, and collaboration. We grow people through continuous learning, strong leadership, and meaningful assignments.Here, you don’t just work on data —
 



**you elevate industries with it.** 




  





**Join Us** 




 If you're ready to build data solutions that scale, lead cloud-native engineering practices, and shape the future of SAP analytics — then you’re ready to become a Multiplier.
 



**Apply now, become a multiplier and help multiply value with data.**

title: Software Engineering Intern: Stockholm – Summer 2026
description:
***Welcome to Warner Bros. Discovery… the stuff dreams are made of.***








**Who We Are…**





 When we say, “the stuff dreams are made of,” we’re not just referring to the world of wizards, dragons and superheroes, or even to the wonders of Planet Earth. Behind WBD’s vast portfolio of iconic content and beloved brands, are the
 *storytellers* 
 bringing our characters to life, the
 *creators* 
 bringing them to your living rooms and the
 *dreamers* 
 creating what’s next…
 









 From brilliant creatives, to technology trailblazers, across the globe, WBD offers career defining opportunities, thoughtfully curated benefits, and the tools to explore and grow into your best selves. Here you are supported, here you are celebrated, here you can thrive.
 








**Software Engineering Intern – Summer 2026**

  
 






 Stockholm, Sweden
 


  
 





  
 




**About the organization:**

  
 






 Warner Bros. Discovery’s global technology organization sits at the intersection of tech, entertainment, and everyday utility. Our platform covers everything from search, catalog, and video transcoding, to personalization, global subscriptions, and more. As a pure tech organization, we are essential to Warner Bros. Discovery’s continued growth, building world-class products on our streaming platforms HBO Max and discovery+
 

 .  
 


  
 








**Why Join the Warner Bros. Discovery Team?**

  
 






 Delivering one of the largest and most iconic content
 

 libraries in
 

 streaming to millions of consumers around the globe is no easy feat. It requires
 

 high levels
 

 of collaboration, a willingness to take risks, and a passion to tackle some of the most complex technical challenges. That is why at Warner Bros. Discovery, we cultivate an environment for our employees to thrive, whether it is building all our tech from scratch to continuously innovate, working at the exciting pace of a startup, or
 

 utilizing
 

 our flexible working hours to enhance collaboration with teams across the world.
