title: Group & Event Coordinator
description:
Är du en person som tycker om utmaningar och strävar efter att vara unik och inte som alla andra?


Vill du arbeta i Stockholms förmodligen mest inbjudande och personliga boutique-hotell?


Vi söker en nu en ny stjärna till vårt fantastiska team. Din roll som Groups & Events coordintor är enormt viktig och vi ser gärna du är en dedikerad person med en naturlig fallenhet för service, bemötande och att skapa minnesvärda upplevelser för våra gäster.


The Sparrow Hotel, Stockholms färgstarka och chica boutiquehotell med varm, avslappnad och personlig service. Hotellet består av 87 rum och sviter, mitt i stan två minuter från Stureplan, nära allt och alla. Hotellets hjärta är vår franska vinbar och bistro skapad av Mathias Dahlgren. The Sparrow Hotel drivs av Grand Group, där även Grand Hôtel Stockholm och Lydmar Hotel ingår.


**OM ROLLEN**


Din roll som Groups & Events coordinator är placerad på The Sparrow Hotel.


Som Groups and Events coordinator så är du primärt ansvarig för alla grupper och förfrågningar som har med möten och events att göra och du sköter även kommunikation och bokningar med gäster och grupper via olika kanaler.


Du ska ha service ut i fingertopparna och ha erfarenhet av gästbemötande, helst i hotellmiljö.


Du har en positiv attityd, ser möjligheter i det mesta, är engagerad och vill vara delaktig i vår strävan att varje dag bli ännu lite bättre och skapa minnesvärda stunder för våra gäster.


Du talar och skriver svenska och engelska obehindrat.


Du är flexibel och ser inga hinder för att arbeta dag/kväll under vardagar och helg.


Du skall vara bekväm i att arbeta själv delar av tiden och andra tider i fullt tempo med andra kollegor.


Kunna skapa förberedelser för ett event/möte eller ankomst av en grupp. Kunna vara närvarande under ett event/möte eller med en grupp som är i hotellet och likaså kunna följa upp efter ett event/möte eller vid avresa av en grupp.


Samla alla bekräftelser, kontrakt och avtal på en plats.


Skicka bekräftelser med max 48h väntetid till kunden eller baserat på önskemål från kunden.


Säkerställa förskottsbetalningar och hantera fakturor för alla grupper, konferenser, möten eller övriga typer av bokningar.


Vara flexibel med att kunna servera och hjälpa till och säkerställa att alla in-housemöten, konferenser och event fungerar och levereras med 100% gästnöjdhet.


**VEM ÄR DU?**


Du uppskattar en härlig energi på din arbetsplats där du är med och sprider den. Du vet vad personlig service i världsklass innebär och du brinner för att skapa en varm, professionell och minnesvärd känsla hos våra gäster som dröjer sig kvar. Du är inte rädd för att hugga i där det behövs och du trivs med att arbeta självständigt. Här jobbar vi i ett litet team där vi hela tider hjälper varandra och där teamwork är dreamwork.


Det absolut viktigaste för oss är att du är rätt person som besitter rätt inställning. Du är ansvarstagande, snabbtänkt, självgående och lösningsorienterad samt har en känsla för små och stora detaljer. Att du älskar att ge service och kvalitet och har ett personligt värdskap ser vi som en självklarhet. Om du dessutom är en charmig och sympatisk person med en känsla för vad våra gäster vill ha innan de ens vet det själva: då är det här jobbet för dig!

**Vidare ser vi gärna att du har:**


Erfarenhet av Opera Cloud eller likvärdigt hotellbokningssystem.


Erfarenhet från hotellbranschen.


Har vanan och erfarenheten från möten och events.

  

En ansvarsfull tjänst som Group and Events coordinator på ett av Stockholm mest personliga och inbjudande boutique-hotell.

  

  

**VI ERBJUDER**

  

Tillsvidareanställning om 100 % med sex månaders provanställning


Lön och tillträde enligt överenskommelse.


Anställningsförmåner inom Grand Group


Anställningen omfattas av kollektivavtal.


Vi utför bakgrundskontroller som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess.



Vi motser din ansökan senast den 7/1- 2026, urval och intervjuer sker löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningar.


Varmt välkommen till oss på the Sparrow Hotel där vi tillsammans skapar Sparrow moments!

title: SAP Master Data Governance (MDG) & MDM Senior Manager
description:
Accenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services in strategy and consulting, interactive, technology and operations, with digital capabilities across all of these services. With our thought leadership and culture of innovation, we apply industry expertise, diverse skill sets and next-generation technology to each busine s challenge.


We believe in inclusion and diversity and supporting the whole person. Our core values comprise of Stewardship, Best People, Client Value Creation, One Global Network, Respect for the Individual and Integrity. Year after year, Accenture is recognized worldwide not just for business performance but for inclusion and diversity too.


“Across the globe, one thing is universally true of the people of Accenture: We care deeply about what we do and the impact we have with our clients and with the communities in which we work and live. It is personal to all of us.” – Julie Sweet, Accenture CEO

**Introduction**


Join **Accenture’s SAP Integrated Platform Team (IPT)** in Europe as a **SAP MDG & Data Migration Senior Manager**.  

This is your opportunity to lead in **Master Data Management and SAP MDG**, guiding clients through transformative journeys—from strategy and consulting to solution design and delivery.  

Bring your expertise and creativity to architect innovative master data solutions using SAP’s digital platform for medium to large enterprises.

**What’s in it for you**

* **Shape the future of technology**: Work on cutting-edge SAP S/4HANA and data transformation projects that make a real impact.
* **Global exposure**: Collaborate with diverse teams and clients across industries and geographies.
* **Drive innovation**: Influence data governance strategies and harness AI/ML to create smarter solutions.
* **Grow and lead**: Access leadership pathways, mentorship programs, and opportunities to develop others.
* **Inclusive culture**: Thrive in an environment that values diversity, flexibility, and work-life balance.

  

**Key Responsibilities**

* **Lead with impact**: Advise clients on master data management, governance, and architecture strategies that enable digital transformation.
* **Drive innovation**: Support SAP S/4HANA migration planning and execution, ensuring seamless data conversion and integration.
* **Design smarter solutions**: Create data governance models using SAP MDG and advanced tools, leveraging AI/ML for efficiency.
* **Collaborate and inspire**: Work closely with diverse teams and clients to translate complex requirements into practical, value-driven solutions.
* **Grow the business**: Contribute to sales origination and help shape a successful, forward-thinking practice.

**Necessary Knowledge / Skills**

* **SAP expertise**: Strong background in SAP data management and governance, with hands-on experience in S/4HANA migration.
* **Technical know-how**: Familiarity with ETL tools like SAP Data Services or Syniti ADM, plus Agile/Scrum methodologies.
* **Strategic mindset**: Ability to define data architecture recommendations and implement best practices for data quality.
* **Clear communicator**: Skilled at explaining complex concepts to senior stakeholders in a simple, compelling way.
* **Leadership and growth**: Bachelor’s degree and proven experience in client-facing roles, with a passion for mentoring and team development.

**About Accenture**


Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations services—all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 537,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities. Visit us at www.accenture.com.


Accenture is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applications from all sections of society and does not discriminate on grounds of race, religion or belief, ethnic or national origin, disability, age, citizenship, marital, domestic or civil partnership status, sexual orientation, or gender identity, or any other basis as protected by applicable law.


#LI-EU

title: SAP PUBLIC CLOUD KONSULT
description:
Sigma Technology* All open positions
* Open Positions details
**JOB DESCRIPTION**
-------------------

**SAP Public Cloud konsult**

 *Forma framtidens affärslösningar tillsammans med oss*

  

Vi söker dig som vill vara med och bygga något som verkligen betyder något, både för våra kunder och för vårt växande SAP-team. Som SAP Public Cloud-konsult hos oss får du möjlighet att kombinera rådgivning och systemkunnande med ett genuint intresse för verksamhetsutveckling. Du blir en central del av projekt där moderna molnlösningar möter komplexa behov, och där din kompetens gör skillnad från dag ett.

**Din roll**


I rollen arbetar du nära våra kunder och hjälper dem att realisera värdet av SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud. Du kommer att:

* Levera och facilitera fit-to-standard-workshops
* Designa och konfigurera lösningar baserade på SAPs best practices
* Översätta verksamhetskrav till smarta, skalbara molnprocesser
* Bidra i hela projektets livscykel — från förstudie till go-live och optimering
* Vara en trygg rådgivare som skapar struktur, tydlighet och framdrift

**Vem du är**


Vi tror att du har:

* Erfarenhet av SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
* Förståelse för molnbaserade ERP-processer och fit-to-standard-metoden
* En analytisk och lösningsorienterad approach
* Förmågan att skapa förtroende, bygga relationer och kommunicera tydligt
* Driv att utvecklas, och nyfikenhet inför både teknik, affär och människor


Meriterande är certifieringar, erfarenhet från implementationsprojekt och domänkompetens inom t.ex. Finance, Procurement, Sales eller Manufacturing.

**Vi erbjuder**


Hos oss får du en miljö där både professionalism och omtanke ryms. Du får:

* Möjlighet att arbeta med några av marknadens mest moderna SAP-lösningar
* En konsultvardag med god stöttning, tydlig struktur och hög kvalitet i leverans
* Utrymme att påverka, förbättra och bidra till teamets fortsatta utveckling
* Kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling, certifieringar och karriärmöjligheter
* Flexibla arbetsformer och förmåner som främjar balans och långsiktighet

**Vill du vara med och forma kundernas och vårt eget nästa steg?**  

  

Välkommen med din ansökan, vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig.

**CONTACT**
-----------


För mer information kontakta

title: Head of IP Routers and Fronthaul
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**

  

As the Head of IP Routers & Fronthaul, you will oversee Ericsson’s strategic initiatives and operations for key portfolios, including RAN Connect, Router 6000, and Optical Fronthaul. These portfolios are vital to Ericsson’s 5G transport solutions, enabling the development of scalable, sustainable, and high-performing networks that meet evolving industry demands.

  

In this role, you will guide technical innovation, foster key partnerships, and align business strategies to ensure Ericsson continues to lead the telecommunications industry. Your leadership will enable Ericsson to deliver transformative, market-leading connectivity solutions while meeting evolving operator needs and advancing sustainable practices.

 **What you will do:**

  

* Strategic Leadership:

  

Define and execute the vision and roadmap for RAN Connect, Router 6000, and Optical Fronthaul portfolios, ensuring alignment with Ericsson’s overall strategies.

  

Position Ericsson’s transport portfolios as leaders in cutting-edge architectures, including high-performing programmable networks, RAN Compute, and Cloud RAN, driving innovation for 5G and beyond.

  

Develop and manage strategies and relationships with key transport partners, driving collaboration to shape innovative network technologies.

  

Demonstrate a challenger mindset with strong business insight into customer value, adopting a solution-oriented, end-to-end functional ownership approach.

  

* Product Development & Innovation:

  

Oversee product lifecycle management, integrating emerging technologies like packet-based transport systems, advanced synchronization, and energy-efficient solutions.

  

Drive innovation in scalable network technologies that address operator challenges within modern telecommunications landscapes.

  

* Profitability and Market Growth:

  

Drive portfolio growth and profitability by identifying key market opportunities and executing strategies that enhance Ericsson’s competitive position globally.

  

Collaborate across teams to refine customer-centric solutions and develop compelling value propositions.

  

* Stakeholder Collaboration:

  

Build strong partnerships with Ericsson’s internal teams, customers, and industry organizations to establish cohesive product offerings.

  

Actively engage with external stakeholders to align portfolio strategies with market demands and customer needs, fostering trust and collaboration.

  

* Operational Excellence:

  

Ensure timely delivery of high-quality outputs within budget and resource constraints.

  

Set ambitious performance targets, ensure accountability, and deliver high-quality outcomes on time and within budget.

  

Monitor competitor actions, market trends, and customer feedback, adjusting strategies to enhance Ericsson’s offerings and leadership position.

 **The skills you bring:**

  

* Proven ability to lead high-performing teams in telecommunications
* Deep understanding of the RAN portfolio, with focus on RAN architectures and technologies.
* Demonstrated expertise in IP routing, optical transport, and fronthaul systems
* Comprehensive knowledge of the global telecom market, including emerging trends and evolving transport technologies.
* Demonstrated ability to build and sustain partnerships across diverse teams and stakeholders
**Leadership Requirements:**

  

Bring leadership to life by Creating Clarity through strategic foresight and actionable business strategies, Developing People through empathetic leadership, fostering high-performing teams, and empowering future leaders, and Delivering Results by driving accountability, making decisive decisions under uncertainty, and achieving measurable outcomes that meet evolving market demands.

 **Note: Security clearance including references and relevant background screening will be conducted for final candidates.**

 **Last date to apply: 24th December 2025**

 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

**Primary Recruiter:** Versha Sharma

title: Automation Engineer
description:
**Join Our Team: Seeking an Automation Engineer**
-------------------------------------------------


The energy transition is accelerating, and battery energy storage systems are at the heart of making it work. At Capture Energy, we’re building the infrastructure to support a smarter, more flexible, and secure electricity system — and we’re looking for an experienced **Automation Engineer** to join us on that mission.


Founded in 2023, Capture Energy is a fast-growing company with 41 team members across the Nordics and Spain. Our ambition is to lead the Nordic and European market in battery energy storage — an area experiencing rapid growth as grids decarbonize and electrification surges.


As a small but agile team, we do things differently. That means fewer silos, faster decisions, and more room for meaningful impact. We bring good energy to everything we do — from the systems we deliver to the people we work with.

### **About The Role**


Are you passionate about designing and implementing cutting-edge automation and control systems for energy management? Capture Energy is seeking a skilled **Automation Engineer** to drive technological leadership in battery energy storage solutions. In this role, you’ll develop scalable automation platforms, integrate third-party services, and support our operations team in delivering reliable, real-time control for our Capture Controller and BESS fleet. If you have a strong background in PLC programming (especially Beckhoff systems), industrial network configuration, and system integration, we’d love to hear from you.

### **Work assignments and Key responsibilities**

* **1. Design, Develop, and Implement Automation Systems**+ Create and maintain automation and control systems for the Capture Controller and other platforms.
	+ Program control systems, including PLCs (with a strong preference for Beckhoff), HMI/SCADA, and potentially Go for backend or integration tasks.
	**2. System Integration & Scalability**+ Integrate third-party services (e.g., fast chargers, sensors, monitoring tools) into the Capture Controller.
	+ Develop scalable solutions to support future products and energy systems.
	**3. Network Configuration & Cybersecurity**+ Configure and troubleshoot industrial networks.
	+ Define and enforce cybersecurity measures for automation systems.
	**4. Testing, Commissioning, and Technical Support**+ Perform system testing, commissioning, and plant follow-up.
	+ Provide technical support for operations, including field support and SAT testing.
	**5. Requirements Definition & Documentation**+ Define requirements and structure for the Capture Cloud.
	+ Document software and features for the Capture Controller.
	**6. Continuous Improvement & Collaboration**+ Suggest improvements to processes and systems.
	+ Collaborate with the Technology team, Operations & Services, as well as Product & Delivery team




#### **Skills and Qualifications**

* BSc or MSc in Automation, Electrical Engineering, Control Systems, or a related field
* Experience with PLC programming, preferably using Beckhoff (TwinCAT)
* Proficiency in Go programming language is a plus
* Understanding of industrial networking protocols (e.g., Modbus, CAN, OPC UA)
* Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills in real-world environments
* ️ Ability to maintain structured documentation and manage configuration changes
* ️ Willingness to travel to project sites across the Nordics and Europe
* Team player with a proactive, learning-oriented mindset

##### **Why Join Us?**


At Capture Energy, you’ll join a passionate and collaborative team driving the energy transition forward. We offer an environment that values initiative, encourages learning, and supports your professional growth. As a fast-growing company, we believe our people are our greatest strength — and we’re committed to making sure every team member feels empowered, appreciated, and inspired.

##### **We offer**

* A purpose-driven and people-focused workplace
* Competitive salary
* Generous wellness allowance to support your health and lifestyle
* Comprehensive pension and private health insurance

###### **Application Process**


If you believe you have the responsibility, independence, and drive we are looking for, please submit your CV and a covering letter detailing your suitability for the role. We welcome applicants from all backgrounds and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace.


We look forward to hearing from you and possibly welcoming you to our team.

###### **About the company**

**Capture Energy, founded in 2023, is on a mission to become a leading provider of large-scale battery energy storage systems (BESS).**  

What sets us apart is our end-to-end approach — we support our clients throughout every stage of their BESS projects. This is made possible by our advanced in-house technologies — the **Capture Controller** and **Capture Cloud** — as well as our experienced team of experts who bring deep industry knowledge and hands-on execution to every project.


Visit our website for more information: www.captureenergy.eu

title: Systemspecialist
description:
Vill du ha en nyckelroll där teknik, samhällsnytta och säkerhet möts?
  
Hos oss på Tre får du chansen att använda din analytiska skärpa och tekniska kompetens för att bygga en trygg och pålitlig digital infrastruktur. Här blir du en del av ett team som kombinerar innovation, ansvar och samarbete – och där ditt arbete gör verklig skillnad, både för Tre och för samhället.
  
  

Om rollen
  
  

I den här rollen blir du en central spelare i att säkerställa att våra system fungerar optimalt och att vi följer gällande lagar och regler. Du arbetar proaktivt med analys, teknisk support och förvaltning, i nära samarbete med vår Säkerhetsavdelning. Ditt uppdrag är att förebygga fel, optimera system och bidra till hög driftsäkerhet – allt för att skapa en robust och framtidssäker digital miljö.
  
  

Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter
  
  

Säkerställa efterlevnad av Lagen om elektronisk kommunikation (LDR).
  
Utföra proaktiva och retroaktiva kontroller av lagrad data för att identifiera och förebygga felaktigheter.
  
Analysera problem och utmaningar inom området (Mediation och nätkunskap).
  
Ställa krav på leverantörer vid implementering av förändringar, exempelvis 5GSA.
  
Ställa krav på interna funktioner för att leverera nödvändig trafik.
  
Förvaltning och optimering av Interconnect-systemet för hög driftsäkerhet.
  
Underhåll av Medieringssystem, med fokus på att säkerställa korrekta dataflöden och snabbt åtgärda fel.
  
Några av våra medarbetare
  
Julia Maxén
  
Gruppchef
  
"Jag vill att mitt team ska få de bästa förutsättningarna för att göra sitt jobb på bästa sätt. Det är så vi utvecklar oss som team, men även utvecklar Tre framåt."
  
Henrik Sundvall
  
Digital projektledare
  
"Det absolut bästa med att vara projektledare på Tre är jag får jobba brett med kollegor från alla delar av organisationen och få lära mig nya saker varje dag. Jag har friheten att vara mig själv – och bli uppskattad för det!"
  
Jayasri Battola
  
Utvecklare
  
"The great work culture and the technology made me choose Tre. Working alongside great people in mixed team setups, with both experienced and new talents, along with the latest and greatest tools and technologies like Cloud and Azure."
  
  

Du kan se fram emot att
  
  

arbeta i en miljö där teknik, säkerhet och samhällsnytta samverkar
  
bidra till att Tre följer viktiga lagkrav och bygger en trygg och stabil digital infrastruktur
  
vara en nyckelperson i utvecklingen av våra tekniska flöden och system
  
vara del av en kultur som hyllas av Great Place To Work
  
ingå i en organisation som stolt samarbetar med Women in Tech och Tjejer Kodar
  
  

Vem är du?
  
  

Vi söker dig som är analytisk, driven och trygg i att hantera komplexa tekniska miljöer. Du trivs med att arbeta i gränslandet mellan teknik, data och lagkrav – och gillar att lösa problem som kräver både struktur och nyfikenhet.
  
  

Du har minst två års erfarenhet av SQL, Linux och Python, och vana vid system som kräver hög noggrannhet och teknisk förståelse. Erfarenhet av LDR, Mediering och Interconnect-system är starkt meriterande.
  
  

Som person är du samarbetsorienterad, ansvarstagande och kommunikativ. Du kan förklara komplex teknisk information på ett tydligt sätt, oavsett om du pratar med teknikteam, leverantörer eller myndigheter. Du trivs i en miljö där struktur och noggrannhet är avgörande, håller en hög professionell nivå i allt du gör och vet hur viktigt omvärldsbevakning är för att fatta välgrundade beslut. Du motiveras av att arbeta med data i en kritisk och samhällsviktig miljö och tar ansvar för att leverera kvalitet i varje steg.
  
  

Övrigt
  
  

Den här rollen är placerad i säkerhetsklass. Aktuella kandidater kommer genomgå en säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll och den kommer genomföras innan beslut om anställning fattas.
  
  

Välkommen med din ansökan!
  
  

Vi tar emot ansökningar via denna annons och håller intervjuer löpande. Personligt brev behövs inte, men vi vill gärna att du bifogar CV och svarar på de frågor vi ställt nedan i samband med att du söker. Vi använder tester för att säkra objektiva bedömningar i samband med urval. Tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Bakgrundskontroll görs på slutkandidat.
  
  

Vi har riktigt bra förmåner
  
  

Friskvårdsbidrag, föräldrarlön, pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal
  
  

Flexibla helgdagar och fem dagar extra ledigt per år
  
  

Hundzon & gym i 3huset
  
  

Subventionerad lunch
  
  

Förmånliga rabatter på cyklar, kollektivtrafik och elbilar
  
  

Generösa bonusmodeller eller provisioner
  
  

Vi drivs av att hela tiden försöka göra saker bättre, på nya och annorlunda sätt. Vi ser oss själva som en avgörande del av Sveriges samhällsstruktur, eftersom vi vet att pålitlig uppkoppling är en viktig grundsten i dagens digitala värld.
  
  

Tre föddes som utmanare och är en organisation i ständig rörelse. Vi strävar efter att vara i framkant i allt vi gör. Vi är övertygade om att det är människorna och kulturen på Tre som är avgörande för vår utveckling.
  
  

När du startar din resa på Tre finns det oändliga möjligheter att växa och utvecklas med oss.
  
  

WE THINK LIKE CHALLENGERS - I en föränderlig värld, är vi på Tre nyfikna och ständigt öppna för nya lösningar. På Tre anpassar vi vägen framåt allt eftersom vi provar och lär oss vad som funkar bäst.
  
  

WE WORK LIKE CHAMPIONS - På Tre gör vi alltid vårt bästa. Vi känner ägandeskap för vår uppgift, sätter tydliga mål och håller fokus på det som gör mest nytta för affären.
  
  

WE ACT LIKE BUDDIES - På Tre är vi schyssta kollegor. Vi samarbetar med varandra över team och funktioner, vi bollar idéer, ger och tar emot feedback.
  
  

Enable "functional cookies" to watch the video
  
  

2003
  
Tre först i Sverige med videosamtal och strömning av mobil video. Att se personen som du ringer upp i ögonen är en helt ny upplevelse vid den här tidpunkten.
  
  

2006
  
Tre lanserar mobilt bredband som tredje operatör i världen. Under de kommande fem åren vinner Tre pris för Sveriges snabbaste mobila bredband.
  
  

2013
  
Tre’s systerbolag Hallon startas med en vision att vara den enkla mobiloperatören utan onödigt krångel.
  
  

2019
  
Ett händelserikt år! 3Världen lanseras som innebär att kunder kan surfa i 80 länder till samma pris som inom Sverige. Därefter lanseras 3Samla som gör att alla kunder kan lägga till fler användare till sitt abonnemang och sist men inte minst är Tre först i Sverige med ett lansera ett publikt 5G-nät.
  
  

2025
  
Tele2 Arena byter från 1 januari namn till 3Arena. Med vår starka passion för innovation, uppkoppling och upplevelser ska vi medverka till arenans och områdets utveckling.

title: M365 AI Solution Specialist Stockholm
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
**Vi söker seniora specialister inom Microsoft 365 och AI Workforce som vill skapa moderna, effektiva arbetsplatser för framtiden!**
 Har du minst fem års erfarenhet som specialist inom Microsoft 365 och vill ta nästa steg i en miljö där din kompetens verkligen gör skillnad? Nu söker vi fler seniora kollegor till vårt Modern Workplace-team som vill vara med och forma nästa generations digitala arbetsmiljöer tillsammans med oss på Sopra Steria.
   

  

**Mer om rollen**
 Som Microsoft 365-specialist hos oss arbetar du med att designa, implementera och förvalta strategiska lösningar baserade på Microsoft 365 och relaterade teknologier. Du blir en del av ett kunnigt, inkluderande och engagerat team som drivs av samarbete, nyfikenhet och viljan att skapa verklig nytta och värde för våra kunder.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder en innovativ arbetsmiljö med spännande uppdrag där din erfarenhet, dina idéer och din tekniska höjd blir viktiga för att ta våra leveranser till nästa nivå.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som:**
* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet som specialist eller arkitekt inom Microsoft 365 – du är trygg i din kompetens och van att guida kunder.
* Har arbetat med SharePoint (online och on premise), Microsoft 365, Power Platform och gärna även Azure.
* Är van vid att arbeta i både svenska och internationella miljöer – du behärskar svenska och engelska flytande i tal och skrift.
* Har ett starkt konsultmässigt mindset – du är nyfiken, lösningsorienterad och gillar att jobba nära kund.


 Det är meriterande om du:
   

  

* Tidigare arbetat som konsult.
* Har erfarenhet av arkitektur eller utveckling inom SharePoint eller Power Platform.
* Har erfarenhet och intresse av Co-pilot.


**Varför välja Sopra Steria?**
 Hos oss får du:
   

  

* Möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken inom Microsofts ekosystem.
* Spännande uppdrag hos några av Sveriges mest intressanta organisationer.
* En kultur som bygger på Power of Sharing – vi lär oss av varandra, stöttar varandra och utvecklas tillsammans.
* Trygga villkor, förmåner och en arbetsmiljö där kompetens, balans och gemenskap står i centrum.


**Ansök nu – vi ser fram emot att träffa dig!**
 Vi behandlar ansökningar och kallar till intervju löpande. På Sopra Steria ställer vi höga krav på både kompetens och säkerhetsmedvetenhet hos våra medarbetare. Innan en eventuell anställning kommer du därför att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll, och vid intervju behöver du kunna uppvisa giltig legitimation.
   

  

 Rekryteringsprocessen består av tre intervjuer, personlighet- och logiktest, referenstagning och bakgrundskontroll. Denna kombination av urvalsmetoder ger oss en bredare och mer rättvis bild av dig som kandidat, samtidigt som det säkerställer att både dina tekniska och personliga styrkor kommer till sin rätt. För dig som kandidat innebär det en möjlighet att visa din kompetens och potential från flera perspektiv.
   

  

 Har du frågor? Hör av dig till:
   

  

**Theresia Wiclander** 
 , Talent Acquisition Partner: theresia.wiclander@soprasteria.com
   

  

**Pu Fernqvist** 
 , Rekryterande chef: pu.fernqvist@soprasteria.com
   

  

**Samtal från externa rekryteringsföretag och säljare undanbedes.**
**Ytterligare information**
 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Data Scientist
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* You have 5+ years of experience in a similar role as a Data Scientist and are proficient in analyzing complex data using SQL (Google BigQuery), Python, or R.
* You have a track record of collaborating with engineers in the product development process, helping them shape projects and translate open-ended questions into concrete analysis plans.
* You possess strong foundational knowledge with practical experience in designing and analyzing A/B tests.
* You are well-versed in various analysis techniques, such as linear and logistic regression, significance testing, and statistical modeling.
* You are proficient in creating insightful dashboards using Tableau, Looker Studio or other BI tools.
* Previous experience in the IAM domain is a strong plus but not a must.


**Application deadline:** 
 10-12-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Enterprise Account Executive, Nordics
description:
**Who We Are**
 Verkada is transforming how organizations protect their people and places with an integrated, AI-powered platform. A leader in cloud physical security, Verkada helps organizations strengthen safety and efficiency through one connected software platform that includes solutions for video security, access control, air quality sensors, alarms, intercoms, and visitor management.
   

  

 Over 30,000 organizations worldwide, including more than 100 companies in the Fortune 500, trust Verkada as their physical security layer for easier management, intelligent control, and scalable deployments. Founded in 2016, Verkada has expanded rapidly with 15 offices and 2,200+ full-time employees.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Verkada is currently searching for a talented and ambitious sales representative to grow out our Enterprise function from the ground up in the Nordics region. You would be directly responsible for a greenfield territory with a virtually untapped market of enterprise customers.
   

  

 Verkada is building a world-class sales organisation. Our business requires highly motivated and capable sales professionals. We prioritise drive and demonstrated success in whatever sales role you’ve been in before — we care far less about fancy pedigrees, schools, or a resume with “brand name” companies. We have a fun, positive culture of success and reward.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Source and close new business to consistently meet or exceed quarterly sales quotas
* Build an intimate understanding of Verkada products and their place in the industry
* Manage the full sales cycle: Prospect for new customers, host online demos, create proposals, and close deals
* Maintain accurate pipeline management with expert-level forecasting
* Aggressively exceed goals consisting of outbound phone calls, emails, online demos, and trials every quarter
* Act as a trusted advisor and subject matter expert to customers and channel partners
* Provide market/client feedback to Verkada’s product/engineering team
* This role requires regular travel, estimated to be more than 50% of the time, including both domestic and international destinations as needed. The successful candidate must be comfortable with frequent travel to support business operations, customer and partner engagements and team collaboration.


 What You Bring
   

  

* 5-10+ years of quota exceeding Sales experience working for a technology vendor selling Enterprise solutions
* Experience selling B2B solutions
* A track record of developing a greenfield territory, adding net new logos in an Enterprise software role
* Hunter mentality with solid sales DNA
* Strong verbal and written communications skills
* Extensive customer network
* BS/BA degree strongly preferred
* Fluent in Swedish & English


**This position requires you to be based in Sweden.**
**Additional Information**
* We do sponsor and take over sponsorship of employment visas for this role. If we make you an offer, we will make every reasonable effort to get you a visa.


**Verkada Is An Equal Opportunity Employer**
 As an equal opportunity employer, Verkada is committed to providing employment opportunities to all individuals. All applicants for positions at Verkada will be treated without regard to race, color, ethnicity, religion, sex, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, age, marital status, veteran status, pregnancy, or any other basis prohibited by applicable law.
   

  

*Your application will be handled in accordance with our Candidate Privacy Policy.*

title: Business Analyst at Swedbank – Identity and Access Management
description:
Swedbank’s Identity & Access Management (IAM) team invites you to play a pivotal role in shaping the future of security and compliance throughout our organisation.
   

  

 In Swedbank you have the opportunity to:
   

  

* Play an important role in providing requirements and analysis essential for developing, maintaining, and expanding our Identity and Access Management infrastructure on-premises and in the cloud. Your expertise will support Swedbank's efforts to integrate cutting-edge security technologies within agile frameworks. Your contributions will be instrumental as we transition towards cloud-based solutions vital for protecting sensitive financial data.
* Drive the advancement of digital identity and access management by developing secure, scalable solutions. These solutions safeguard our customers, employees, and business partners across a dynamic hybrid IT environment.
* Collaborate closely with Agile Product Owners to analyse investment opportunities and clarify backlog items with key stakeholders.
* Work with IAM initiatives, gathering requirements and other input for automating onboarding, lifecycle management, privileged access, and compliance projects.
* Optimise security processes by leveraging DevSecOps methodologies and contributing to Swedbank’s cloud transformation journey by implementing secure solutions in alignment with established architectural targets
* Ensure regulatory compliance with standards such as GDPR, DORA, SOC2, and PCI-DSS, while maintaining all required documentation.


 What is needed in this role:
   

  

* Strong business analysis skills: requirements gathering, process modelling, user story writing, acceptance criteria definition.
* Experience in identity and access management (IAM), with knowledge of related principles, standards, and technologies, is a plus but not mandatory.
* Familiarity with IAM tools like Sailpoint, CyberArk, Active Directory, or Microsoft EntraID will be considered as an advantage.
* Practical skills with platforms such as Jira, Confluence, ServiceNow, and SharePoint are highly valued.
* Strong stakeholder management and engagement, and ability to simplify complex access structures and process flows for technical and business audiences.
* Ability to analyze business problems and translate them into technical requirements.
* Understanding of Agile ways of working and general security best practices.
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in IT, Computer Science, or a comparable professional background.
* Certifications in IAM tools (CyberArk, SailPoint, Microsoft Entra).
* Certifications in Business Analysis and/or IT Service Management.
* Knowledge of regulatory frameworks (GDPR, PCI-DSS, DORA), security controls, change control governance.


 With us, you can experience:
   

  

* Personal and professional growth through self-leadership and continuous development.
* Meaningful work that positively impacts our workplace, our customers, and society.
* An open and collaborative culture that encourages cross-functional teamwork and provides networking opportunities.
* A supportive and inclusive environment that promotes a balanced and sustainable work-life, with flexible working conditions when suitable for the role.
* Benefits such as our share based reward program Eken, company pension plan, employee offer for banking products, health insurance.


 "Join our team and...
   

  

 become part of an international team of professionals, who work together to deliver challenging projects, enhancing security to reduce risk and maintain stakeholder trust while delivering business value and customer satisfaction which contributes to Swedbank's position in society."
 **Pär Kidman,** 
**your future manager**
 We look forward to receiving your application by 12.26.2026.
   

  

 We work with continuous selection, which means that the position may be filled before the application deadline.
   

  

**Location: Stockholm, Göteborg, Tallin, Riga, Vilnius**
**Recruiting manager: Pär Kidman**

title: Lead Java Engineer with Digital Asset Management
description:
**Job Description**

**WHAT YOU’LL DO** 
**​**
  

 We are seeking a highly skilled & motivated a
 **Lead Software Engineer for the Visual Asset Repository (VAR) team** 
 . VAR team provides the centralized storage, version control, and reusability for various types of images and movies used for H&M Group commercial communication.
   

  





 As the lead, you will have a holistic understanding of the technical ecosystem, with hands-on expertise in DevOps, performance tracking, and cross-domain knowledge across multiple technology areas. This role requires a strong leader who can effectively design solutions, manage technical roadmaps, and ensure seamless integration and deployment while fostering a collaborative team environment. Our ideal candidate will have the team-first attitude!
   

  

  

  

**Key Responsibilities**



* Develop and articulate a technical roadmap that aligns with the organisation's strategic goals and emerging technology trends.
* Ensure security best practices are embedded in system architecture, application design, and deployment processes to protect data and infrastructure.
* Design and document scalable solutions that span multiple teams, fostering cohesive application development and deployment.
* Take ownership of the solution, embracing a proactive, "fail-fast" approach while remaining accountable for successes and setbacks.
* Identify and resolve technical obstacles to ensure seamless product development, while balancing risks, constraints, and realistic time and cost estimations.
* Apply broad technical expertise across frontend, backend, mobile, infrastructure, and devops domains to facilitate cross-team collaboration.
* Leverage strong interpersonal and communication skills to resolve conflicts, drive collaboration, and effectively present technical solutions.
* Lead change and release management processes to ensure seamless integration, deployment, and software delivery.
* Continuously monitor and improve system and application performance using relevant tracking metrics.
* Drive cost optimisation through efficient resource allocation, cloud usage, and architectural decisions that balance performance, scalability, and budget.
* Stay informed on emerging technologies and best practices, ensuring their practical implementation within the team.



**WHO YOU ARE** 
**​**



* Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent experience.
* 10+ years of experience in software engineering with a proven track record of technical leadership, system design, and mentoring.
* Prior knowledge of working with OpenText DAM (Digital Asset Management)
* Problem-solving skills and risk accessing ability to troubleshoot complex issues and manage timely deliveries.
* Strong leadership and mentorship skills with the ability to foster a positive and collaborative team environment.Significant experience in software development, with a proven track record in leadership or senior engineering roles.
* Strong expertise in Solution Design, DevOps and Performance Tracking.
* Capable of creating and executing technical roadmaps aligned with business goals.
* Proficiency in at least one technology stack (e.g., frontend, backend, mobile), prefreably Java and Spring Boot, with a solid understanding of other areas and the ability to confidently lead and collaborate with cross-functional teams of varied expertise.
* Experience of developing & delivering scalable systems using Azure or GCP
* Strong collaboration and problem solving skills within cross-functional teams.
* Experience with technical estimation and planning in software projects.
* Proficient in performance monitoring tools and optimisation techniques.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills with a proactive, solution-oriented mindset.
* Familiarity with change and release management processes.
* Up-to-date with emerging technology trends and industry best practices.


**Additional Information**

**WHO WE ARE**
  

 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.
   

  

  

  

 We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future.
   

  

  

  

**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE**
  

 At H&M Group, we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer our employees attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.
   

  




* **Staff discount card** 
 : Usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online.
* **Competitive pensions** 
 : Collective Agreement and ITP pensions competitive to the Swedish market.
* **Generous vacation** 
 : 30 days’ vacation, health care allowance, and good work-life balance.
* **Additional perks** 
 : Discounts from Benify.
* **Innovative Environment** 
 : Work with cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions.
* **Global Impact** 
 : Be part of a team that influences users worldwide.
* **Professional Growth** 
 : Endless opportunities to learn and develop your skills.
* **Collaborative Culture** 
 : Join a motivated team that values collaboration and excellence.



**JOIN US**
  

 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.
   

  

  

  

 Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here. We are eager to meet you!
   

  

  

  

*We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.*

title: Senior Tech Lead till finansorganisation
description:
Vår kund genomgår en omfattande modernisering av sina dataplattformar och affärssystem. Inom detta arbete etableras under 2026 flera nya agila utvecklingsteam som kommer att ansvara för nyutveckling, optimering och initial förvaltning av nya stödtjänster. I scopet ingår bland annat en masterdatalösning/register, filkommunikation samt ett nytt användargränssnitt i form av en produktgemensam portal.
   

  

 Vår kund söker därför nu en senior Tech Lead som kan kombinera strategiskt ledarskap med praktiskt utvecklingsarbete och som kan stötta samtliga team i etableringen av moderna arbetssätt, arkitektur och teknisk leverans. Uppdraget ställer höga krav på prestanda, säkerhet och dataintegritet.
   

  

**Uppdragsbeskrivning / Arbetsuppgifter**
* Leda och driva teknisk riktning för flera utvecklingsteam inom projektet
* Etablera tekniska strategier, arkitekturprinciper och gemensamma arbetssätt
* Bidra med hands-on utveckling inom berörda system och komponenter
* Stötta teamen i nyutveckling, optimering och uppbyggnad av långsiktig förvaltning
* Säkerställa att lösningarna uppfyller krav på säkerhet, stabilitet och prestanda
* Arbeta nära produktägare, kravanalytiker och lösningsarkitekter för att driva teknisk helhet utifrån verksamhetens behov
* Kvalitetssäkra API-design, integrationsmönster och tekniska beslut
* Driva förbättringar i utvecklingsprocesser, CI/CD-flöden och teststrategier


**Skallkrav**
* Mycket god erfarenhet av utveckling i Java (Spring Boot)
* Erfarenhet av REST API-utveckling, microservices och kontraktsbaserad design
* Praktisk erfarenhet av Kafka, eventdrivna flöden och integrationsmönster
* God erfarenhet av Kubernetes och containerbaserad drift
* Erfarenhet av PostgreSQL
* God förståelse för frontendlager, inklusive React med TypeScript
* Förståelse för UX/UI och erfarenhet av BFF-mönster (Back-end for front-end)
* Förmåga att modellera API-kontrakt och JSON-strukturer
* Erfarenhet av automatiserad testning (JUnit, integrationstester)
* Vana att arbeta i on-prem miljöer med cloud-agnostiskt förhållningssätt
* Erfarenhet av arbete i agila team och agila leveransmodeller


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av masterdatahantering
* Fördjupad erfarenhet av eventdriven arkitektur
* Erfarenhet av filkommunikation och integrationsplattformar
* Erfarenhet av frontendutveckling och UX-relaterat arbete


**Personliga egenskaper**
* Lösningsorienterad och prestigelös
* Flexibel och trygg i snabbt föränderliga miljöer
* Stark kommunikativ förmåga och god samarbetsförmåga
* Helhetsperspektiv med förmåga att driva teknisk riktning
* Samarbetsinriktad och van att arbeta över flera team


**Start:** 
 2026-01-12 eller enligt överenskommelse
   

  

**Slut:** 
 2026-12-31, med option på förlängning
   

  

**Omfattning:** 
 100%
   

  

**Plats:** 
 Stockholm, kundens kontor i Liljeholmen
   

  

**Enhet:** 
 Engineering
   

  

**Övrigt:** 
 Uppdraget är säkerhetsklassat och kräver fördjupad säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll i samband med avtalstecknande.

title: Head of Solution Area Defense
description:
**Grow with us**
**About This Opportunity**
 We are a leading provider of 5G communication solutions, used in both civilian and Defense applications, enabling secure and reliable mission-critical connectivity in the most demanding environments. Our innovative technology lays the foundation for digitalization of the Defense sector across strategic, operational, and tactical use-cases.
   

  

 As the Head of Solution Area Defense in Ericsson Mission Critical Networks, you will spearhead the strategic direction, portfolio management, and delivery excellence for Defense communication solutions.
   

  

 This is a critical and highly visible role where you will represent the voice of the business area at the executive level ensuring offerings meet evolving operational needs.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Be the focal point for Ericsson’s Defense strategy ensuring we build and deliver world class Defense communication technology
* Grow the business by 5x and double the size of the team to ensure Ericsson is the go-to partner for Defense clients globally
* Be a thought leader and strategic partner to executive customers, partners and governmental and Defense agencies
* Partner with cutting edge R&D teams and oversee product and solution development lifecycle from concept to delivery to maintain an innovative edge.


**You will bring**
* Deep understanding of Defense communications technology use cases and experience implementing this at scale
* Strong network and credibility in national and international Defense organisations, government agencies and companies selling to the Defense industry.
* Understanding of secure network architectures and Defense-specific requirements.
* Excellent stakeholder management, communication and negotiation skills and ability to operate in complex international environments.


**Leadership Requirements**
 Strategic Vision – The ability to define a long-term strategy that aligns the mission-critical network solutions with Defense sector needs, national security priorities, and technological innovation trends.
   

  

 Proven Industry Expertise – Extensive experience in Defense communications, secure network architectures, and military-grade solutions. A deep understanding of operational scenarios where networks must perform flawlessly under extreme conditions.
   

  

 Stakeholder Engagement – Exceptional relationship-building skills with government officials, military leaders, industry partners, and internal executives to ensure consensus and value delivery.
   

  

 Cross-functional Leadership – Ability to inspire, guide, and coordinate multidisciplinary teams—including engineers, project managers, and operations staff—while fostering collaboration and accountability.
   

  

 Cultural and Ethical Awareness – Sensitivity to geopolitical contexts, ethical considerations, and compliance with international Defense regulations.
   

  

**Note: Security clearance including references and relevant background screening will be conducted for final candidates.**
**Last date to apply: 24th October 2025**
**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm
   

  

**Primary Recruiter:** 
 Martin Eriksson
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 773986

title: Staff Software Engineer, Infrastructure
description:
**Who We Are**
 AeroVect is transforming ground handling with autonomy, redefining how airlines and ground service providers around the globe run day-to-day operations. We are a Series A company backed by top-tier venture capital investors in aviation and autonomous driving. Our customers include some of the world’s largest airlines and ground handling providers. For more information, visit www.aerovect.com.
   

  

 As a Staff Software Engineer, Infrastructure, you will own the core systems that power AeroVect’s autonomous driving platform. You’ll design and scale infrastructure that supports development, testing, and deployment across the full autonomy stack — ensuring reliability, performance, and seamless integration between software and real-world robotic systems.
   

  

 This is a highly impactful, cross-functional role at the intersection of robotics software, DevOps, and cloud infrastructure. You’ll help define technical strategy, architect scalable systems, and mentor engineers while advancing the robustness of AeroVect’s production autonomy platform.
   

  

**You Will**
* Architect, develop, and maintain core infrastructure supporting AeroVect’s autonomous driving software stack
* Build robust CI/CD pipelines to enable rapid, reliable software delivery and validation across simulation and real-world testing environments
* Collaborate closely with autonomy and systems engineers to define scalable software interfaces and deployment strategies
* Design and maintain cloud-based infrastructure (AWS) for scalable computation, data processing, and system telemetry
* Implement and manage infrastructure-as-code (Terraform, CloudFormation) for consistent, automated provisioning
* Develop automation tools and internal services to streamline developer workflows, integration testing, and operational monitoring
* Establish and enforce best practices for software reliability, observability, and system security
* Drive root-cause analysis for infrastructure and deployment issues; design long-term solutions to improve system resilience
* Mentor engineers and influence best practices in infrastructure design, CI/CD, and cloud operations


**You Have**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Robotics, Electrical Engineering, or a related field
* 7+ years of experience building infrastructure and tooling for large-scale robotics or distributed systems
* Strong proficiency in Python, C++, and Bash, with a focus on building automation and tooling
* Hands-on experience with ROS/ROS2 and robotic software deployment pipelines
* Expertise with CI/CD platforms (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, CircleCI)
* Experience managing cloud infrastructure (AWS) and automating deployments with Terraform or CloudFormation
* Proficiency with containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes)
* Familiarity with Git-based workflows, code review processes, and collaborative software development practices


 We Prefer
   

  

* Experience supporting safety-critical, real-time, or high-availability systems
* Knowledge of monitoring, logging, and alerting tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, or the ELK Stack
* Familiarity with networking, security, and distributed system performance optimization
* Background in robotics DevOps, including simulation orchestration and data pipeline automation

title: Client Executive till Walley!
description:
***Walley strävar efter att vara det självklara valet för stora e-handlare och retailbolag i Norden och vi vill ha fler talangfulla personer med oss på vår resa.
   

  

 Vi vet att rätt betallösning är en avgörande faktor för handlares framgång.
   

  

 Därför söker vi en Client Executive som är mer än bara en closer – någon som kan utmana kundernas perspektiv och erbjuda betalningslösningar som ger verkligt värde. Om du är redo att bygga djupa relationer med Nordens främsta e-handlare och hjälpa dem att omdefiniera sina betalflöden, vill vi gärna höra från dig!***
**OM ROLLEN**
 I rollen som Client Executive kommer du att bygga och utveckla nya partnerskap med ledande aktörer inom e-handel och retail. Du ansvarar för att skapa förtroende och visa på det affärsvärde våra lösningar ger, och fungerar som en strategisk rådgivare som hjälper kunder att förstå betalningens roll i deras framgång. För att lyckas arbetar du nära både marknads- och produktteam och säkerställer att varje kundmöte anpassas efter deras behov och utmaningar.
   

  

**OM DIG**
* Gedigen erfarenhet av komplex B2B-försäljning, med minst 3 års erfarenhet inom betallösningar.
* Etablerat affärsnätverk inom retail och e-handel är mycket meriterande.
* Förmåga att kommunicera på ett framstående sätt och fungera som strategisk rådgivare för kunder.
* Du trivs med att utmana och vägleda kunder genom insiktsdriven försäljning.


 Redo att hjälpa kunder förbättra sina betalprocesser? Ansök idag och bli en del av vårt team!
   

  

**AFFÄRSOMRÅDET WALLEY**
 Walley utvecklar lösningar som gör betalningar smartare, enklare och tryggare för både handlare och slutkunder. Walley erbjuder dels den tekniska checkoutlösningen när kunden har tagit sin varukorg vidare för betalning, dels kreditlösningar (faktura, delbetalning m.m.). Walley fokuserar på större handlare i Norden, även med verksamhet i andra länder och inom en bredd av branscher.
   

  

**OM NORION BANK GROUP**
 Norion Bank Group är en affärsnära nordisk finansieringsbank. Genom koncernens varumärken Norion Bank, Walley och Collector erbjuds kundanpassade finansieringstjänster som möter distinkta kundbehov inom tre kundsegment: medelstora företag och fastighetsbolag, handlare och privatpersoner. Som specialist på finansieringslösningar är Norion Bank Group ett ledande komplement till traditionella storbanker, med visionen att vara den främsta nordiska finansieringsbanken inom de utvalda segmenten.
   

  

 Norion Banks erbjudande omfattar företags- och fastighetskrediter samt factoring för medelstora företag och fastighetsbolag. Genom varumärket Walley erbjuds flexibla betal- och checkoutlösningar till handlare och privatpersoner. Varumärket Collector tillhandahåller privatlån och kreditkort till privatpersoner samt sparkonton för privatpersoner och företag. Norion Bank Group (tidigare Collector Bank) grundades 1999 och har kontor i Göteborg, Stockholm, Helsingborg, Oslo och Helsingfors. Verksamheten bedrivs genom Norion Bank AB (publ) som är noterat på Nasdaq Stockholm.
   

  

**NORION BANKS ERBJUDANDE TILL DIG**
 För oss är det självklart att varje individs utveckling värdesätts högt vilket innebär ett stort fokus på självledarskap och kompetensutveckling. Gemenskap, innovation och modern arbetsmetodik är saker som kännetecknar Norion Bank Group. Vi erbjuder dig helt enkelt en organisation med snabba beslutsvägar, stor öppenhet och mycket energi.
   

  

 Våra värdeord Affärsmässighet, Engagemang och Omtanke genomsyrar allt vi gör och som medarbetare hos oss blir du en del av vår starka företagskultur. Vi erbjuder dig ett spännande bolag med goda utvecklingsmöjligheter, löpande kompetensutveckling och gemensamma aktiviteter på och utanför arbetsplatsen.
   

  

**FÖRDOMSFRI REKRYTERING**
 Vi vill att vår rekryteringsprocess ska vara rättvis och inkluderande. Därför ber vi dig att inte bifoga foto eller annan information som inte är relevant för tjänsten. Personligt brev är inget krav.
   

  

**Vi undanber oss kontakt med rekry** 
**teringsbolag, konsultbolag samt
 **annonsörer** 
 i rekryteringen.**
**INTRESSERAD?**
 Kul! Urval och intervjuer sker löpande så ansök redan idag!
   

  

 Norion Bank Group är en affärsnära nordisk finansieringsbank. Genom koncernens varumärken Norion Bank, Walley och Collector erbjuds kundanpassade finansieringstjänster som möter distinkta kundbehov inom tre kundsegment: medelstora företag och fastighetsbolag, handlare och privatpersoner. Som specialist på finansieringslösningar är Norion Bank Group ett ledande komplement till traditionella storbanker, med visionen att vara den främsta nordiska finansieringsbanken inom de utvalda segmenten.
   

  

  

  

 Norion Banks erbjudande omfattar företags- och fastighetskrediter samt factoring för medelstora företag och fastighetsbolag. Genom varumärket Walley erbjuds flexibla betal- och checkoutlösningar till handlare och privatpersoner. Varumärket Collector tillhandahåller privatlån och kreditkort till privatpersoner samt sparkonton för privatpersoner och företag. Norion Bank (tidigare Collector Bank) grundades 1999 och har kontor i Göteborg, Stockholm, Helsingborg, Oslo och Helsingfors. Verksamheten bedrivs genom Norion Bank AB (publ) som är noterat på Nasdaq Stockholm.

title: Senior ASIC Verification Lead
description:
Swedium Global is the growing System Engineering and Solution Company, offers services like Semiconductor Engineering R&D Services, Embedded Systems Development, Custom Application Software Development, Web and Cloud Application Development, Testing Services, Consultancy and Outsourcing services to our clients across the globe for an onsite and offshore business model. Swedium Global is having presence in Sweden, Finland, Poland, Czech Republic and in India.
 



  






 https://swediumglobal.com/
 




  





 Job Name- ASIC verification Engineer
 



 Location-Onsite in Sweden
 



  





 What you will do
 



 ·    Define verification requirements and strategies for ASIC designs based on functional specifications and following Ericsson development processes
 



 ·    Implement verification environments and test cases to complete verification plans
 



 ·    Measure functional and code coverage metrics, and drive toward completion targets
 



 ·    Debug RTL in conjunction with designers
 



 ·    Collaborate with other development teams to understand overall product requirements and drive efficient solutions
 



 ·    Contribute to the continuous improvement of products, tools, and processes
 



 ·    Generate appropriate documentation
 



 ·    Guide and educate early career engineers
 



  





 You will bring
 



 ·    12+ years of experience in ASIC verification
 



 ·    Master’s degree in electrical or computer engineering or equivalent
 



 ·    Excellent knowledge of UVM methodology and System Verilog
 



 ·    Experiences in Formal verification
 



 ·    Knowledge of C, Emulation & HLS is preferable
 



 ·    An analytical approach and be results oriented with the ability to deliver under pressure
 



 ·    Excellent English verbal and written communication skills
 



 ·    High self-motivation, an ability to work independently while being a great teammate.

title: Account Executive – Sweden
description:
**Do you thrive in B2B sales and love turning conversations into long-term partnerships?**
 Are you motivated by achieving results, eager to take ownership, and looking for an environment where your efforts are valued and your work truly makes an impact?
   

  

 Do you enjoy building meaningful client relationships and seeing the tangible results of your work?
   

  

 If that sounds like you, keep reading.
   

  

**Your Mission**
 As an
 **Account Executive for the** 
**Swedish market** 
 , you will play a key role in expanding Aurora Live’s presence.
   

  

 You’ll build your own client base from scratch, managing the full sales cycle — from prospecting to closing and beyond.
   

  

 Once you win new business, you’ll manage and nurture those accounts over time, ensuring clients continue to see value through our exclusive B2B matchmaking platform.
   

  

**In This Role, You Will**
* Identify, qualify, and engage potential clients to build and maintain a strong sales pipeline.
* Reach out proactively via phone, email, and LinkedIn to generate new business opportunities and start meaningful conversations.
* Understand each client’s challenges through in-depth needs assessments and propose solutions that truly address their goals.
* Earn trust and credibility by demonstrating expertise, consistency, and genuine customer focus.
* Take full ownership of the accounts you win — maintaining close relationships and ensuring ongoing satisfaction and success.
* Act as a strategic partner to your clients, helping them achieve results while strengthening long-term collaboration.
* Work closely with cross-functional teams to align objectives, share insights, and ensure the highest service standards.
* Stay ahead of industry trends by continuously expanding your market knowledge and understanding of client needs.


**What We’re Looking For**
* Proven track record in B2B sales, ideally within tech, SaaS, or professional services.
* A proactive, results-driven approach and ambition to grow in an international environment.
* Ability to build trust, credibility, and long-term client relationships.
* Excellent communication skills in Swedish and English.


**What We Offer**
* Performance rewarded: You’ll receive an attractive compensation package with base salary, commission, and an additional starter bonus to support you as you ramp up and build your sales pipeline.
* Growth and learning: From day one, you’ll benefit from a four-week onboarding program and continuous coaching through our international ME Academy, ensuring you’re always developing and moving forward in your career.
* Career opportunities across Europe: As we continue to grow, you’ll have the chance to explore international opportunities. With offices in Helsinki, Amsterdam, Antwerp, Copenhagen, Berlin, Stockholm, Kuala Lumpur, and Barcelona, your career can take you anywhere.
* Recharge & Thrive: We care about your well-being and want you to stay energized both inside and outside of work. That’s why you can earn up to 12 extra vacation days each year and enjoy local perks such as gym and massage discounts, along with other wellness benefits. Curious about the details in your location? Ask your recruiter to learn more.
* We win together: Collaboration is our driving force, and every success is shared. That’s why we love bringing people together through company trips, international events, and local office celebrations — whether it’s hitting the slopes in Levi, running the Berlin Marathon together, or celebrating milestones across our offices in Europe.
* Annual company trip: Every summer, all employees from our different offices come together in Finland for an exciting company trip - a mix of team building, knowledge exchange, and celebrations.
* Global Community & Diversity: Diversity is part of our DNA. With colleagues from over 50 nationalities, you’ll join an international community where every culture, perspective, and background fuels innovation and success.


**Recruitment Process**
* Screening video call with our Recruitment Team.
* First interview with the Hiring Manager.
* Second interview (including a short role-play) with the Team Manager.
* Reference check and/or short personal assessment


 Please submit your
 **CV in English** 
 .
   

  

**About Aurora Live By Management Events**
 Aurora Live by Management Events is the
 **leading B2B partner** 
 for technology and management service providers — connecting them directly with top decision-makers from the largest and most influential companies.
   

  

 Through our
 **exclusive matchmaking platform** 
 , we help commercial teams
 **shorten sales cycles, accelerate business conversations, and build lasting customer relationships** 
 .
   

  

 Trusted by
 **over 10,000 senior IT decision-makers** 
 and
 **900 solution providers** 
 across 11 countries, we create
 **strategic meetings that deliver** 
 real business results.
   

  

 We’re proud to be the trusted partner of some of the most
 **innovative companies in the technology and management space** 
 .
   

  

 At
 **Aurora Live by** 
**Management Events** 
 , we’re transforming the way leaders connect, collaborate, and grow.
   

  

 Working with us means being part of an
 **international, fast-paced, and purpose-driven company** 
 , where ambition meets action and every idea can make an impact.
   

  

 Our teams bring together smart, curious, and driven individuals who love what they do — connecting visionary leaders, shaping industries, and celebrating success along the way.
   

  

**Ready to be part of something extraordinary?** 
 Join us and help shape the future of business connections.

title: Revenue Operations Systems & Data Manager
description:
**Overview** 




 The Revenue Operations Systems & Data Manager plays a pivotal role in ensuring the integrity, usability, and optimization of core go-to-market systems. With primary ownership of Salesforce Service Cloud and Pardot (Marketing Cloud), this role also serves as the steward of data across the Revenue and Customer organizations.
 



  





 Acting as a trusted partner to Marketing and Customer teams—and collaborating closely with Sales and Finance—you’ll ensure that systems, integrations, and data empower strategic decision-making, customer insight, and operational efficiency. You’ll join a collaborative team that thrives on improving processes, building scalable infrastructure, and driving growth through data-driven insights.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




**Salesforce Service Cloud & Pardot System Ownership** 



* Serve as the primary owner and administrator for Salesforce Service Cloud and Pardot, managing configuration, customization, and ongoing enhancements.
* Translate business requirements into scalable, efficient solutions that align with revenue and customer processes.
* Oversee system performance, integrations, security, and user access, while driving user adoption and best practices.
* Collaborate with IT and RevOps colleagues to ensure seamless system connectivity and data flow across the go-to-market tech stack.



  





**Data Governance & Quality Management** 



* Define, implement, and enforce data quality standards, policies, and best practices across Salesforce, Pardot, and related tools.
* Monitor and maintain data hygiene, launching initiatives to improve completeness, accuracy, and usability.
* Manage data enrichment and validation tools (e.g., Dun & Bradstreet) to ensure data integrity across all systems.
* Partner with cross-functional teams to ensure compliance with data privacy and security regulations (e.g., GDPR).



  





**Other responsibilities** 



* Own the technical integration and ongoing optimization of Dreamdata, ensuring seamless data flow between marketing platforms and Salesforce to enable accurate attribution, campaign performance tracking, and full-funnel visibility.
* Partner with Customer Success and Sales to ensure alignment of customer lifecycle data and reporting.
* Support the development of dashboards, reporting frameworks, and insights that guide leadership decisions.



  





**About You** 




**You will thrive in this role if you:** 



* Have strong technical and administrative expertise in Salesforce Service Cloud and Pardot (Marketing Cloud).
* Are passionate about data accuracy, integrity, and governance, with a keen eye for process improvement.
* Bring a collaborative mindset and can translate technical solutions into business impact.
* Enjoy working cross-functionally to solve problems and create clarity from complexity.
* Have knowledge or experience with Dreamdata (or similar attribution platforms) to connect marketing data to revenue insights.



  





**Preferred Qualifications** 



* Hands-on experience managing Salesforce and Pardot, including automation, data management, and integrations.
* Proficiency with reporting tools, data enrichment platforms, and RevOps processes.
* Drive and work with project management with professional communication skills.
* Salesforce Administrator or Pardot Specialist certifications are a plus.
* Proficient in business English; fluency in any Nordic language is an advantage.

title: Cyber Security & Risk Advisor
description:

 Strategic cyber security role responsible for securing internal and third-party solutions in a complex enterprise environment, influencing security strategy, and evaluating emerging technologies like AI, Generative AI, and Machine Learning.
